[Attached 1] Yubei Hou: 'South Ding to go, big flag does not fall' (2016.11.12)
Older people are afraid to boil the winter. In the early winter of Zhengzhou this year, it is strange, cold air like a little wife, not to appear, but still take away a highly respected old man. 
He is the carrier of the Yu Army of Literature, Mr. Nandin. 
Mr. Nightdin's curriculum vitae looks like this:
Nanding, formerly known as Ho Nan ding, Bengbu in Anhui. CCP member. Completed at East China School of Journalism in 1949. Previous editor of 'Henan Daily', editor of Henan province, professional writer, chairman, secretary of the group. Consultant of Henan Federation and Writers Association of Henan Province, chairman of the Committee on Protection of Literary and Artists Copyright of Henan Province, Fifth Committee of China Federation, 7th and Eighth People's Congress of Henan Province. Published works since 1950. 1956 Joined China Writer Association. Published novel episodes 'Inspector Ye Ying', 'At Sea', 'Defendant', 'Tail', essay essay essay 'Watermark', 'Selected South' (upper and lower volumes), and the Nandinese Book (five volumes). 
But to learn more intuitively about Mr. Nighting's experience, you can use the words written by Anhui writer Hu Zhufeng to summarize:
'South of the 1950s, working in literature; South of the 1960s, in life; South of 1970s, in the wind and rain, South of the 1980s, carrying the banner of art and art of the Central Plains...' 
Since 1991, Nandin retired as Chairman of the Union, and since then he has been the immortal day of his pencils. 
And now the big star fell, Wen Xian West, Mr. Nandin past bit, will become the material of people of the Minyois people. We may wish to use Hu Zhufeng to summarize Mr. Nandine's key words, beaded into lines, memories of Mr. Nandine's life two or three things, to send condolences. 
Mr. Nanding was originally a Bengbu, Anhui. He was 18 years old together with 30 students from East China School of Journalism in Shanghai to work in the Henan Daily in Kaifeng at that time. Two months later, he had not had time to write news, he was led by old comrades from the newspaper to Xuchang rural areas to participate in the 'anti-domination battle'. 
In February 1950, after returning from the countryside, he was selected to work in Henan Wenlian creative team. 'What was creation then? What to write? Do not understand.' Mr. Nightdin recalled. 
Fortunately, at that time, the creative team came to the famous poet Xu Yuluo, and then came from Shanghai to Mr. Yao Xueyin. It is in such an environment that slowly follows them to write things, and from here on the road to writing, Mr. Nightdin said. 
In 1953, Nandan went to Zhengzhou Textile Machinery Factory to experience life, and in February 1955 published the famous short novel 'Ye Ying' in 'Yangtze River Arts'. 
The novel uses sophisticated conception, clean, detailed and practical language, vividly depicts the young workshop female inspector Ye Ying in order to lofty ideals, dare to be more true, positive work noble image, showing the new spirit of urban workers. 
'Inspector Ye Ying' at a moment caused a strong reaction among readers. It was reproduced to People's Literature in August of that year, and the People's Education Publishing House also compiled it into high school language textbooks. 'Ye Ying' became an idol of the times at a time. 
'In 1956, the National Young Writers' Congress discussed the author's short story, when I was very cattle, and my 'Inspector Ye Ying' ranked first.' In that year, South was only 25 years old. Later, every time, the old man was still proud to remember the situation. 
'I have experienced all the political movements since the founding of New China, and I played different roles in the left as the right. Society is a big director, let you be what you do!' When Mr. Nightding said this word, only the practice and transparency of life, did not reveal a silk. 
Being beaten into the right, devolved to the Dabieh Mountains for transformation, was the beginning of Mr. Nendin's life. 
It was a period of old days. Day after day to mountain mining, Shimoda work, 12 years, Mr. Nan ding did not write a thing. 
During the torment, the elderly are not enough for the outside humanity. But the writer Sun Muqing wrote about such a detail in the Literature Old Man Ho Nan ding. 
In Zhengzhou railway station, every time from here and then return to Xinyang Xinyang County right labor retraining, Mr. Nandin can't help but shadly. On one occasion, he was painfully and painfully removed the only money on his wrist-a Shanghai brand watch, looking for cigarettes for two packs of gold leaf cigarettes. The top of the worthless sale, to the old people at the time, but is the inner consolation. When a bite of smoke spits out with the breath of the heart, the poor heart is healed. 
Mr. Nightdin said he had smoked since 1953 and had not put it down again. Sun Muqing said that Mr. Nanding's cigarettes are not small, and he smokes very nice, very natural and elegant. 
Perhaps, the old man smoked at the train station at that time, he didn't say so much. 
Out of Mount Dabieh, and went into Dabetsu Mountain 
Mr. Nandan, 39, was relegated to the Nanyang West Gap during the Cultural Revolution. 
In the deep depths of Dabiesan, came to the 'right' Ho Nanding, Sanmin called him 'Ho Tai Pot' (brother), the local dialect, no distinction. 'Ho Tai Pot' sat on an equal footing with the mountain people and became a family of sunrise and sunset. 
The life of Mr. Nightdin was still well, but his mind was completely different when he was 28 years old. From this deep mountain road, there is a family of three people who home, Mrs. Zuo Chun, daughter Xiangyang. Optical name, it is full of poetics. 
The small water team unveiled the three houses of Kamakura, and gave Mr. Nan dingg 'Kan Ta Lei' a study room. In the mangang Funiu Mountain Road, since the bus, the car is flying down the slope of Kamakura. After Mr. Nanding settled here, dedicated one stop: Ho. 
In 1993, Mr. Nightdin was 60 years old. That year he went to Xixia for a meeting, there was an elderly man, no money to buy a ticket, and walked 70 miles to see him. He is the production captain Wang Yun summoning at the time of the devolution of Mr. Captain King saw his face, rushing, and only one word: 'Want you, come to see you. Do not eat the meal at the meeting.' Finish, turn around and go. 
In the spring of 1980, when Mr. Nandine was committed to creating and maintaining a good creative momentum, the second meeting of Henan province was held again after 26 years, at which he was elected vice-chairman of Henan Province. 
'Perhaps by nature, I take this vice chairman into a position, and I want to make a point.' At that time, Mr. Nightdin saw many places created large literary journals based on the publication of novels, and Henan's novel creation was weak, and he strongly suggested that Henan should also run a large journal. 
Soon, he named 'Mangyuan' for this issue. It is the creation of 'Mangyuan', for henan literature germination and growth in the future to provide a broad world, and also laid a very important foundation for the rise of the Chinese Plains. 
In August 1983, Nightdin was appointed chairman and secretary of the group of Henan Federation. In the late 1980s, 'Literature Yu Jun' was born, and the Chinese strength of Yujun, such as Li Peifu, Zheng Qiying, Tian Zhongho, Zhang Yu and other heavyweight writers, were transferred by Mr. Nandin as chairman of Henan Province. 
Circle people analyze the reason for the rise of 'literary Yu Jun', can not open Mr. Nandin this 'Alpine'. All say that literary people are light, Wentan has always been a lot. However, people who know the inside know that Mr. Nandin is very caring, treating and supporting Henan writers. In his eyes, only the talents and merit of the writers were left. All he thought was how to create conditions for them to come up with good works and contribute to Henan's literary career and the new Chinese literary career. 
Everyone thinks that Mr. Nightdin can unite all writers, can care for all writers, no matter how defiant this writer is, and whether he is close to himself or not. 
This is of great practical and educational significance to the present altar. 
Writer Li Peifu said he founded Henan's first large literary publication 'Mangyuan' with the slogan: to run a literary land, pull up a team of literary and Henan army... he did it. Until today, the development of Henan literature, the construction of the team, and this 'tree man' is inseparable. This is the 'flag' we need to remember. 
Writer Zhang Yu said that he was talented and gracious, and I myself believe that several of our middle-aged writers have grown and progressed from learning to be a man. He is the big tree of the Wentan of Henan, the old example of the Wentan of Henan. 
Whether it is 'flags' or 'big tree', the later's admiration to Mr. Nandingh has been as high as the river. At a literary salon where he attended, he remained silent when the attendees gave him a tidal praise again. After all of the speakers here, Mr. Nightdin smiled and whispered with his humorous tone: 'What are you saying?' 
Full of consternation, not waiting for everyone to slow down, Mr. Nandin had the lyrics of Zhang Kwok Wing song 'I':
I always love this I, happiness is more than one way to be happy, the most honored is the creator's glory, do not hide, live for my life, without ink, standing in a bright corner. I am me, is a different color fireworks, the sky sea, to make the strongest foam. I like me, let Vivian develop a result, lonely desert, as full of naked...
Nowadays, Mr. Nightdin is gone, but he still leaves us with the fireworks of different colors.

【Attached】Zhao Qi: 'Xinjiang Military Region Seize Rightists' (1957.8.24)
'The Liberation Army newspaper' reporter Zhao Qi reported that the political department and cadre department of the Logistics Department of Xinjiang Military Region revealed the true face of Ning Xin, a cultural assistant and right-wing activist. 
Ning Xin published an article in the wall, entitled 'Some Opinions on the Rule of Law', a massive attack against the anti-rebellion movement. The defamation check was 'flipping the box, violating human rights, violating the Constitution'. To organize a confession to him for a review, admitting that the struggle was indeed wrong. He also actively pulls up dissatisfied people and joined him in attacking the party. 
Nimsin unscrupulously attacked the party's cadre policy. He cursed us to 'worship old cadres blindly, worship party members blindly'. He thinks that the selection cadres are 'very good, nothing is good', and that the use of him is 'like a cattle' and that he is 'excluded by the sectarian'. He said that the political liar Li Wan-ming was able to climb to such high positions as a result of the party's blind worship of party members. He also insulted workers and farmers and said that 'industrial and peasant cadres are massively incompetent and rely on their qualifications to eat.' He shamelessly dressed himself as a 'warrior' to attack the leadership cadre of workers and farmers. He said that the image of workers and peasants in the film was 'worthless,' and he himself admitted that 'holding a belly grunge to the workers and farmers cadres.' 
Nimsin has also consistently hated the revolutionary discipline of the army, distorting freedom of the press. He constantly claims to people that 'the army is not free, the army is special' and that 'the army has more rules and regulations, and the ideological constraints are large, cannot be arbitrary.' He hated that the Xinjiang Daily and Military Region newspapers did not publish his statements at the intellectuals and literary workers colloquium, and did not publish his paintings that deprecated the image of the People's Liberation Army, saying 'this is a restricted press.' 
Many comrades revealed his true face at the meeting. He was a landlord, capitalist family origin. Before liberation, he was the team leader of the Sanqing team, compiled the school's publication 'Sea Breeze', and actively develop Samqing team members and monitor progressive students. He was praised by the reactionary authorities for his reactionary activities and became a member of the KMT in 1948 when the National Party merged with the Three Youth League. Before fighting against the rebellion, he often provoked dissension with some politically unclear people. Nynsin has been hiding his many reactionaries before and after his liberation, and many comrades questioned him: Are people like you really fighting wrong? Comrade Zhai Zhian exposes: Ning Xin peeks his own dossier in 1953. One morning in November 1955, Ning Xin took the opportunity to crack into the protection section, opened the locker, and stole six kinds of investigation materials about him. People angry geology asked him: Who is turning the box down, in violation of the Constitution? (The Liberation Army newspaper, August 24, 1957)

【Attached 1】Chengdu People's Procuratorate of Sichuan Province: 'Indictment (66), Procuratorate No. 027' (26 August 1966)
Defendant Niu lihua, male, 30 years old, Han ethnic, Beijing, capitalist of family origin. In 1957 in Chongqing Yangtze River power plant rampant attack to the party was classified as the right, because of disobedience to supervision and reform, 1958 was sent to re-education through labour, in October 1961 removed the right hat, lifted re-education through labour, leaving Tonghui car repair factory employment so far. 
Defendant Niu lihua, in the counter-revolutionary case, was arrested by the Chengdu Municipal Public Security Bureau on 12 July 1966 in accordance with the law, and transferred to the Court for examination of indictment after the pre-trial trial. After examination it was found that his criminal facts were as follows:
The defendant Niu lihua, after the lifting of re-education through labour, has always insisted on the reactionary position. The extreme hate party and socialist system have viciously and systematically attacked the Party's policies and policies, slandered that 'the basic points of the implementation of the left under the three red flags have changed, and are still shouting for long live the overall route' and 'Great Leap' The achievements of progress are fictitious...' The attack, fight against the right, said, 'Countervailing and expanding, 'There are too many enemies that China is now delineated, and revisionism will appear in the future.' 'I will commit suicide without revisionism in China.' 
The defendant also tried to stigmatize socialism, glorify the capitalist system, promote 'freedom' of the bourgeois, saying that 'today's society is not free.' Attacking Mao Zedong Thought was an inconsistency in words and deeds. 'Theoretically it is one set, what is done is another set', and slandering the proletarian cultural revolution 'is trying to criticize the material that is to find that. If you don't want to criticize that, the problem is no longer big.' 
The defendant has not pleaded guilty because he was classified as right-wing, and since 1965 has often barred to turn the case, saying, 'I want to go to the central government'. When other employed people discouraged, I actually said, 'I am not afraid of suffering, two are not afraid of death, three are not afraid of hot, willing to pull the emperor down the horse'. He also said, 'Since the party sees me as an enemy, and I think of me as a mustard, I will see you as Kouchou', reactionary flame is very 
In summary, the defendant Niu lihua has always insisted on the reactionary stance, viciously attacked all the Party's policies and policies, slandered the proletarian cultural revolution, arrogant clamor to reverse the case, causing an extremely bad impact among employed people. In accordance with the spirit of Article 10, paragraphs 1 and 3, of the Regulations of the People's Republic of China on Punishing Anti-Revolution, it shall be punished according to law. 
cǐzh
Chengdu Xicheng District People's Court
Attorney General Chen Qingyun
26 August 1966

【Attached Four】Niu lihua: '55 years past, pride like the day and heaven-anti-right movement 55th anniversary message set' (editor-in-chief Xie Xiaoling)
xiǎo
In the summer of 1957, a member of the Communist Youth League who grew up in a red scarf, believed in communist teachings and loved the motherland, and a technician of a military industrial enterprise, was beaten overnight into the right. I was promoted to the extreme right and re-education through labor because I wrote in a private message to my classmates, 'anti-right does not justify, it is metaphysical buckle hat'. He was forced to remain in re-education through labour in 1961, from spiritual to physical, form to content, still dictatorship. In 1965, I wrote an ideological report that opened the way: 'I do not turn the case, I do not deny the great political movement because of personal problems; not to put responsibility on the party. I only hope to get the understanding and appointment of the party, or understanding and forgiveness, after many years of removal of the hat, allowing me to return to the ranks of the people.' What is expected to cause the Chengdu Intermediate People's Court to sentence 15 years to imprisonment for 15 years without investigation, without trial, irrefutable, and no appeal, such as an extremely illegal means. The only charge was 'to expose ideas and excuses to the correctional cadres to speak openly to counter-revolutionary speech'. Because I was not guilty, I was put in a black cell of about three square meters. After sending to deep mountain to perform hard labour, after nine deaths, 1979 won the 'correction'. I am still alive today and can see the trend of democracy and freedom growing. 
Testimony
The anti-right movement has been over 55 years, people in this doom, in the heart and flesh torment of purgatory, have exhausted the golden hours of life, a considerable majority in cruel torture and grievances left the world, still alive for more than old years. Examining the causes, processes, outcomes and consequences of this tragedy is not just redress, nor just claims, but in the hope that similar tragedies will not be repeated. All this cannot be done without the investigation, analysis and statistics of the experiences and experiences of each right-wing element and his family. The study is difficult because of the number of millions involved and the blockade of anti-right archives by the authorities. Using the Chinese Communist Party's style, in order to cover up its evil, will not only hide the truth, block information, but it is also likely that it will be a great deal of destruction of data, which may be a pity in Chinese history. 
I went through seven re-education through labour and re-education units, and it took 23 years. Although there is no detailed statistics on the specific number and age distribution of right-wing elements in each unit, I also have a general understanding. Recall, most of those classified as the right are twenty and thirty years old, and if the number and age of the right are drawn as a normal distribution curve, this age group is an abrupt peak. At the time of writing the memoirs, it was found that the youngest is only 12 years old schoolchildren, and the largest is the 118-year-old monk. I don't know what the 'Party' is, actually let the naive children and monks who jump out of the three circles outside the five lines are brought on the hat of 'anti-party', a masterpiece of the Communist Party of China, a wonders of the world.

I. Arrest in prison
On Tuesday, July 12, 1966, I dawn as usual. 
The hostel is in the middle of the plant, the ground floor, about 36 meters long and about 10 meters wide, the ground floor is the factory, lathe, milling machine, planer... roar day and night, upstairs is the residence of employed people. 
More than 200 people live in about 360 square meters of space. There is no bed, all sleeping on the floor, the entire floor of the house is a big bunk. Each person's bunk is about 60 cm wide, 200 cm long, equivalent to the area of a coffin. There is no isolation between the two bunks, nor is it allowed to hang the curtains, the neighbors on both sides of the left and right are close like two. These two hundred people one by one line in four rows along the length of the large house, leaving an aisle of about one meter wide in the middle of the two rows, like stacking a row of inventory for years. 
Dormitories turn off the lights during the day, but overnight lights illuminated, easy to check out the house at night to the building at a glance, at a glance. 
I climbed up from the shop, put on clothes, a towel, a toothbrush, a pair of foam slippers, a rectangular cement tank downstairs on the side of the yard, with seven or eight tap faucets, providing cold water throughout the year, more than 200 people need to wash their faces here. 
I got washed there and walked to the open space behind the house and practiced Tai Chi for a dozen minutes. 
The day is not completely bright, misty, a touch of bloody red flood in the northeast of the gray blue sky suddenly disappears, there are two or three piles of dark clouds in the southwest moving scattered, it seems cloudy to sunny today, windy. 
The canteen had opened the door, I quickly ran back to the dormitory and took chopsticks to the cafeteria for a dime, two or two food tickets to buy a bowl of porridge, a steamed bread. In order to save money, this meal is not eaten in the early morning, can not take five minutes, steamed bread, porridge sweep and light. Go back to the bed and get ready to work. 
I was working on mechanical design at the Technical Section. Technical section is located in the middle of a roadside bungalow, the house is brick, the pillars are brick, the wall is bamboo grate, bamboo grate two batter mud, brush lime, the surface is not only but very white, but also able to shield the wind and rain. 
Speaking of just technology, but all the technical work of Sichuan fire machinery factory. The chief of section and deputy section chief are public security cadres who do not understand technology. They do not work in this room. They only come when arranging or inspecting work. There are only seven so-called employed persons who have been forced to stay in the reform unit after the removal of re-education through labour. The efficiency of its work is by no means comparable to the average state-owned enterprises. 
In a house of about 24 square meters, in addition to me, there are seven desks; Xu Bingquan (apprentice, technician, 60s, experienced, good at mechanical manufacturing and maintenance, removal of re-education through labor, removal of anti-socialist hats), Yu Huanian (graduated from technical school, early 30s, worker technician. Good at turners, milling workers, can also design drawings, remove labor re-education off anti-socialism Hat), Tao Ye (40 years old, former director of production of Chongqing General Machinery Factory, machinery manufacturing, removal of labor re-education to remove the right hat), Liu Hongfu (30s, Changchun Automobile Tractor Academy graduated in 1955, former military enterprise technician, machinery manufacturing, lifting labor education but still wearing a counter-revolutionary hat), Zhou Enguang (32 years old, graduated from Shanghai Jiaotong University in 1956, former military technician, machinery manufacturing Professional, English good, but also lifted re-education through labor and wearing a counter-revolutionary hat), Xiao Zuyi (32 years old, Chongqing University, graduated in 1956, former aeronautical design institute technician, remove the right hat). 
One of the seven was a member of the Communist Party, four were members of the Communist League, and two non-party figures, who were originally comrades in the revolutionary ranks. In 1957, anti-right movements were classified as hostile elements and forced re-education through labour, but the names of the hats were different, because they said at that time the workers did not reverse the right, let everyone rest assured that they helped the party to put an anti-socialist hat later on to wear an anti-socialist hat, and smudged with the right. History or family origin is a bit problematic wearing a counter-revolutionary hat, and also joined tens of millions of 'earth, rich, anti, bad, right' teams. 
Who knows that the result was in trouble when the right was rectified in 1979. The right can be corrected, not the right can't rectify it, so they have complained that they all came into the labor force because of the great anti-right movement, hoping to be in the ranks of the right, and even fought to wear the right hat. After a long break, except Xu Bingquan has passed away, I don't know how to deal with it, the rest of the colleagues have received the brilliant gift of the Party to restore their honor, resume their duties and restore their wages 20 years ago. As for youth, nature is not recoverable anymore. 
In 1957 or 1958, according to three years, re-education through labour should be lifted in 1961. The release of re-education through labour is no longer called a re-education through labour force, but it cannot leave the unit without permission, the economic treatment is unchanged, and political treatment is to change the name 'employed person'. By 1966, the seven persons in the Technical Section had been detained by the dictatorship authorities for a total of eight and nine years. That day, at least half an hour before working time, I rushed into the office, in a hurry, because I needed to complete the design and drawing of the sand mixer as soon as possible. The general picture has been drawn, I open the drawing and thinking, looking at a part, think about what else needs to be done. 
Six other colleagues have come successively, and a busy day is about to begin. At this time the tweeter on the outside pole suddenly sounded the broadcast: 'All the people gathered at 8:30 to the auditorium for a meeting.' 
What is the urgent thing? 
In recent months, the Cultural Revolution has been in full swing, exposing the 'three villages' and criticizing the 'Yanshan Night Talk'. The louder the slogan 'angry whatsoever...' 'Destroy...' 'Sweep everything...' The hat of the 'cattle ghosts' flies, do not know who will fall on the head one day. The leaders of Beijing, including Deng Tuo, Wu Han and Liao Mosha, have become anti-party gangs. It is hard to understand that senior cadres of the Communist Party such as Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi and Yang Shangkun became reactionaries that usurp power overnight. 
Although the re-education through labour unit is closed, from articles published in the newspapers, these groups held in proletarian dictatorship cages also predicted that China's 9.6 million square kilometres of land would have set off a political storm, with a menacing momentum and a fierce degree of intensity as opposed to 1957. Right motion. 
In 1957, Mao Zedong opened a knife to democratic parties and intellectuals in order to preserve one-party dictatorship. Now, the party's top leaders and founding fathers are intending to protect the widowhood dictatorship. 
The immortal fought, and the people suffered. Millions more will be put into jail, and tens of thousands will die. 
The more sensitive people seem to see the impending disaster and the slim personal future. Examiner Li Xinggui died by electric shock, electrical maintenance worker Lai Peirong took poison, technician Xu Bingquan tried to commit suicide, and Li had committed suicide with a knife (after rescue). In a short period of time, several successive suicide incidents have added to this place of re-education through labour. 
Two arrest conferences were held in June and July. Seven eight people, including Yu Hongxi, Zuo Xiang, Zhu Yuanshan, etc., were arrested. The Sichuan Fire Machinery Factory was killed at a time, and everyone was at risk, and the atmosphere of panic and disturbed was growing. 
I was not desperate at that time, but also had illusions about Mao Zedong and the Communist Party. 
In May, I and Li Shihui went into the marriage hall after three years of love, and her marriage leave expired, she only returned to Shaping Farm in Ebian County, Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture, Sichuan Province. I also look forward to a better future. For the stability of small families, I decided to rely on technology to eat later, no longer care about national events, but also to stay away from politics, just want to spend a peaceful day with my wife. I have not done anything that violates the law, and I follow the rules and cramped my tail in accordance with the requirements of the Communist Party, nor will it be my turn to a big political storm. 
At 8:30, more than 400 re-education through labour were forced to remain in places of re-education through labour and continue to undergo rehabilitation in places of rehabilitation, crowded with the 'auditorium'. 
Usually such a conference is presided over by Zhou Yigui or Zhang Yuxin, Chief of the Corrections Unit. Today, Wang Wei, director of the workshop, was replaced. Often it is factory director Zhang Zhichao speech, today replaced with people who do not know, is said to be the head of the factory working group. Regardless of who he is, people try to kill me for fish and meat. In exchange, they are the police officers of the labor reform team, the tools of the proletarian dictatorship. We are 'second-class citizens' and dictatorship objects. 
The meeting began, and Wang Wei said loudly: 'Today is the assembly of 'anti-transformation elements' Niu lihua to arrest the criminals Niu lihua! 
I then stood up, and I didn't know when four heavily armed men appeared behind me, escorted me to the side door of the 'Auditorium', did not read out the arrest warrant and did not let me sign, but inexplicably ruthlessly handcuffed me by an armed police force. 
I stood at the door of the auditorium, closed my eyes and breath a long breath, calmed my emotions, then opened my eyes and looked around, a place where I had suffered mental and physical torture for seven years, where I used to endure the grievances to be understood and appointed. Research technology is looking forward to the opportunity to work for the motherland, I used to prepare for it Two physical and chemical labs place, it's going to say goodbye. 
I am worthy of my heart, to the people, to the country. I'm going to go out of this door with my head high, not to lose my head, let alone whisper. 
Suddenly, Correctional Officer Dai Fuqing came to the side. He weighed me up and down with his innumerable eyes, and I drove my eyelids and looked at the ground when I met with his eyes. 
After about two minutes, I saw him walking towards the armed police, whispering what he said. After about two minutes, the armed police came in front of me and opened the handcuffs with a special key and loosened two buckles, and then I realized that both hands were already swollen. 
I looked at Dai Fu Qing, and he turned around and saw his back slowly moving, moving, gradually moving away. 
Passed my armed police ordered: Go! I turned left out of the narrow lanes next to the auditorium, to the main road in the factory, not far in front of a middle jeep. 
I did not slowly walk forward, looking back, four armed police with guns tightly followed in the back. They were not on the shoulders of guns, but rather with bayonets, a Japanese devil into the city in a position. In addition to the handcuffs, Wen Weak books born in their opinion seem to be martial arts extraordinary rival, I hummed with my nose involuntarily. 
Walked, opposite a familiar face, usually no interaction, but each other knew that they were re-education through labor workers. He walked more than a meter away from me and sent the word 'take care' with the movement of airflow and lips. I did not let the vocal cords vibrate and answered the two words 'rest assured.' The sound is small but I believe he can hear it. Unfortunately, I don't know the name of this hard friend, but remember just as if he was a turner who has not seen him again for more than 40 years now. 
On the inside of both iron railing and with military green canvas covered by a strict solid car, driving only ten minutes, the car stopped. 
I got off the car and the sun outside was a little shaking eyes. Look up, the car parked in a relatively secluded alley, facing an iron fence door, went in the door for a moment, escorted my armed police opened the handcuffs, I had two hands carrying a small luggage roll standing. Two people come out from the inside, in the next communication room to check in the handover procedure, and then drink order: go! 
The two men dressed in police uniform did not carry a long gun, it was unknown whether there were short guns, one in front of the road and one in the back. When I left Ningxia Street Detention Center in October this year, I deliberately counted a number. In 1954, the People's Republic of China promulgated the first Constitution. 
Article 85 states: 'All citizens of the People's Republic of China are equal in law'. 
Article 87 states in an informative manner: 'Citizens of the People's Republic of China shall have freedom of speech, publication, assembly, association, procession and demonstration. The State provides the material facilities necessary to guarantee the enjoyment of these freedoms by citizens.' 
With regard to court trials, article 76 states: 'People's courts shall hear cases in public except in special circumstances provided by law. The accused shall have the right to a defence'. 
Article 78 makes it clear: 'People's courts shall conduct independent trials and are subject only to the law'. 
I was arrested in 1966, before going through the Communist Party's obsession, coercion and manipulation of the masses, a 'anti-right' campaign that took out of context, distorted and fabricated, indiscriminate, and arbitrarily cluttered hats, and suspected of sending people without investigation, unverified, indefensible, not even a single legal instrument. I am full of thinking that the judicial authorities will be able to effectively investigate, try them seriously and take legal issues seriously, but the actual situation is greatly anticipated. 
In accordance with the statutory procedure, the general interrogation process should include the following steps: (1), the Public Security Bureau pretrial, where the defendant confirms all the facts of the crime at the pre-trial, or writes its own opinion on the pre-trial record; (2), the Public Prosecutor's Office examines, verifies the pre-trial materials and confirms whether the prosecution is prosecuted; (3), confirmation of the prosecution. prepare the indictment after the indictment and send a copy to the defendant to prepare him for his defence; (4), In accordance with the law, public hearings and sentences were pronounced. 
How was the interrogation actually? 
I was arrested on 12 July 1966. On the morning of 14 July 1966, Huang Liding, a examining magistrate of the Public Security Bureau, said that it took only a few minutes to ask the name, age, origin, and different cases, and so on. 
More than a month later, the formal pre-trial was not held until 18 August. This time a pre-trial officer was replaced and a clerk was added. 
During the interrogation, I generally did not argue on issues that differ from the facts, but are not marginal, but only to give the necessary explanations for alleged allegations that are unfounded or reversed. 
At the end of this trial, I saw that the records were incomplete, even large discrepancies in some places, and could easily be misunderstood and requested for additions and corrections. The examining magistrates were very disgust. I had just written a few words, and he was extremely impatient, and fortunately the clerk had asked me to continue writing, which allowed me to make a brief addition to individual issues. In order not to cause greater dissatisfaction among the pre-investigators, many mistakes in the record were not effectively prosecuted. 
I think this is the first pre-trial, and the interrogator only asked a few topics, without in-depth questions, and it is inevitable that it will be interrogated in the future. Since it is certainly necessary to clarify all the facts on a case-by-case basis, it can be left to the final determination upon completion of the pre-trial case. 
Anyone knows that after this pre-trial there is no further trial, and the necessary step to close the pre-trial case has been omitted, the steps taken to review and verify the material by the Public Prosecutor's Office, and the indictment has not been issued to the accused before appearing in court. memoirs.memoirContent:
【Attached】Lin Yao: 'Button Badge: Every history is a touching story'
'Southeastern shape Sheng, Sanwu City, Qiantang since ancient times bustling.' Liu Yong's 'Wanghai tide' gives people a beautiful view of rich shu Jiangnan, where Huzhou on the southern shore of Taihu Lake, the 'Silk House, the hometown of fish rice, the state of relics' became a jewel of Jiangnan. Huzhou is one of the birthplace of world silk culture, silk factory, founded in 1918, Dachang silk factory, has been occupying a more important position in Huzhou. As the successor to the Dachang silk factory, the old generation of business and businessmen, former Standing Committee of the CPPCC, President of the Provincial Federation of Industry and Commerce Mr. Niu Shouzhang told us about his past. 
Shouldering the responsibility of revitalizing the home
'My career was developed in the succession of fatherhood.' Button Badge opens the door of memory, and fervently recalls the father's little bit by bit. 
The father of Niu Jiechen, born in 1888, is the founder of Dachang silk factory. He was 21 years old into Huzhou Laoduntai crêpe, 23 years old was promoted to Shanghai old Dun Tai when accounting. At the age of 25, given that silk was selling, good business, Buttonson left Laoduntai to do their own crepe dealer, trafficking crepe from Huzhou airport to Shanghai sales. From the age of 26, buttonhouse brothers three people partnered to open Hongsheng Changchu Zhuang, from a trader to a business, engaged in lake crepe shipping wholesale sales in Shanghai, thus accumulating capital for further development. 
In 1911, the buttonson brothers began to set up in the home to set up two handmade woven woven machines for family workshop production, and then increased to four, called 'button Dachang', self-produced. In 1918, in Xiaoxi Street Huilong Bridge partnership raised funds to expand 20 manpower looms. Since then, Huzhou Dachang factory gradually flourished, button home also began to develop. 
As a businessman, Niu Jiechen summed up a business warp of 'people without me, people have me fine, I am fine'. In the early years of the Republic, the main raw material of Lake silk was earthwork, which was made from rural family law. Due to the shabby equipment, silk stripe thickness, rough head, more broken head, must spend artificial shake, and low yield, quality times, it is impossible to weave finer, thinner high-grade silk satin. In order to strive for high and fine product development, Dachang silk factory determined to build its own silk factory, production of white factory silk, 1927, buttonhouse made in Deqing tiaoxi silk factory. However, after the outbreak of the anti-Japanese war, Japan, in order to compete for the silk market in the world and China, systematically and purposefully destroyed China's silk cause. As soon as they embarked on the fertile soil in the south of the country, they saw mulberry trees cut off and destroyed them. The Tiaoxi silk factory was demolished by the Japanese invaders, destroyed the plant, and looted several times. The pseudo-army bandits were fuelled by the bursting of fire, and the last fire burned light, rubble was lost. 
In 1946, the 22-year-old Buttonguang graduated from the Department of Business Administration at Shanghai Hujiang University, a choice of life is in front of this upright young man. He wanted to go abroad for further studies, but Nou Che asked his son to dispel this idea, because in this son, Nou Jiechen placed too much hope. 
'In fact, I was already in the factory when I was studying. Under the supervision of my father, I studied in the morning and went to the factory in the afternoon, to write reports every day, work very hard.' The young button badge is not as laid-back and relaxed as other grandmen, strict father always reminds him to take on the responsibility of revitalizing his home and revitalizing the industry. 'My father will smoke and drink alcohol, but he never closes his mouth, and he smokes domestic alcohol from domestic cigarettes. What he said most to us was the suffering he suffered when he was an apprentice.' Perhaps it was the father's speech and so that it was his father's teaches, so many of the young people at the time were less hastolic, as his father was thrifty and diligent. 
At that time, Buttonhouse owned silk factory, silk factory, refinery, flour factory, factory in Huzhou, management office and sales point in Shanghai. The young buttonguard shoulders the hopes and aspirations of their parents, dedicated to the family business, learned a lot of business operation knowledge and practical experience. He thought he could learn and apply the expertise he has learned to practical work, but it is against his will. Inflation and currency devaluation caused by the corrupt rule of the Kuomintang have replaced normal operations. The turbulent situation made the Button Badge quickly in trouble, from 1946 to 1949 liberated, he struggled for three years, but the company was always in the midst of wind and rain. 
Moved by two things in the Communist Party
Once again, the father's choice affects the button badge. 'In the early days of the liberation war, some people advised my father to leave Shanghai to go overseas. My father was unmoved, and was determined to stay in the mainland to coexist with enterprises. He said to me that he was born from a young age, one was covered in Shanghai, and had eaten all the bitterness, started his own hands, did not do bad things. If the Communist Party wanted to liquidate, he could dedicate all enterprises to the country, and individuals could also continue to work for the country. My father also said that abroad is nothing more than being bullied in other countries, and domestic suffering is always born to have roots.' So far, the beaten button, which has passed the old years, still admires the father's choice. 
His father's perseverance has created confidence in the Button Badge, and he started to know the CPC from two first-hand experiences and saw a better future for the new China. The first thing was the day the PLA entered downtown Shanghai when he saw a neat row of PLA fighters living on Nanjing Road and Jinling Road pedestrians. At that time, the world was drizzle, after day and night marching, extremely tired fighters, rather risking the wind and cold, a street slept next to a street, many shop owners couldn't bear, persuaded them to go into the house to sleep, but there was no single warrior to disturb the common people. The second thing is the afternoon of the day after liberation, leaders such as the head of the Huzhou Municipal Military Administration Commission, municipal committee secretary, mayor and chairman of the Federation of Trade Unions came to the Dachang Silk Factory and the labor and labor parties to meet very late. At the end of the meeting, it was already lights, everyone was still hungry, and the day was raining. Several leaders did not. With rain gear, button badge to leave them for dinner, but not retained. But see they all took off their shoes, barefoot and ran back in the rain. At the door of the factory, the 'big officials' of the Communist Party left the back of the rain, admiration, was born. He was convinced that the Communist Party could not only destroy an old world, but also to build a new world. 
This speculation is corroborated by the facts. From 1949 to 1953, affected by the war, the domestic market of high-end consumer goods like silk tended to shrink, domestic sales very difficult, exports were blocked, several years of export interruption, products simply could not sell out, the entire silk industry suffered a very big blow. 'It was not useful to encourage the resumption of production at that time, because the things produced could not be sold, there was no money to buy raw materials or pay wages, and production was unsustainable.' At this moment, there have been several stormy buttons, peacefully, that the anxiety, restlessness and discomfort of the time were not seen. However, the button badge at that time was almost restless and sleepless, and he did not have any means to see the family that his father handed over to him at stake. At the same time, the government began to acquire its finished products, issue loans, and the factories also began to issue wages, and then export gradually, and then adopted various support measures of a national capitalist nature such as processing orders to help, and enterprises began to improve gradually. 
'I sincerely thank the Communist Party, thank the government, pulled me in my most difficult time, and brought me spring life, otherwise my father created this family business...' 
Actively engaged in public-private partnerships
Through continuous learning and practice, we have gradually realized that capitalist business and industry must undergo socialist transformation, the highest form of which is public-private partnerships. In the winter of 1954, his father Niu Jiechon personally participated in the first shareholders meeting after the public and private partnership in Huzhou Power Plant, and received the dividend distribution. He heard in the report of the public representatives the huge changes in the plant after the PPP. The case, the corruption of the power plant in the past, I know best. My shareholder has never received a penny dividend. I could not expect the Communist Party to make the power plant so good and pay dividends again.' He also attended the shareholders meeting of the PPP Dachang Su factory the following year, and he was surprised and happy that production had increased significantly after just two years after the PPP. 
When it comes to public-private partnerships, Niu Shouzhan recalls one thing at the turn of the spring and summer 1954. It was the United Front Department of the East China Bureau of the CPC Central Committee held a symposium on public-private partnership work in East China, which was held at the Shanghai Jinjiang Hotel. At that time, it was 'Huangmei Day', when the big water flooded the highway from Huzhou to Shanghai. The representatives who went to Shanghai to attend the meeting, the then deputy director of the private side of the public-private joint venture Dachang silk factory, and the Bai-you Minister of the United Front Work Department of Huzhou Municipal Committee, as well as four representatives of the public and private joint venture Huzhou Power Plant and the director of the public and private sector, could only take a boat from Huzhou to Jiangsu Shengze, and then get on a car to Shanghai at 89:00 in the evening. Bell is up. Comrade Chen Yi, the mayor of Shanghai and deputy secretary of the East China Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, who was planning to make an important speech on the next day on the state policy on public-private partnership, had to rush to Beijing that night, so the speech was recorded in advance. The next day business representatives from East China heard a recording at the symposium. Speak. East China is a well-developed area of industry and commerce in China. Naturally, it is also the focus of public-private joint work. Representatives of industry and industry from all provinces and cities gathered in the Shanghai Communist Republic is, is a very important meeting, so the meeting has been very long and has been held for more than 10 days. In addition to listening to Comrade Chen Yi's important speeches, all regions also introduced first Take a step by step with the experience and problems of public-private joint ventures and around how to better advance the work (later shackdown (Zhang Cai learned that the conference was prepared for the 1956 industry-wide public-private partnership climax), the development of production, good public-private relations, and how to carry out the transformation of enterprises at the same time as the transformation of enterprises. 
'At the meeting, I met Mr. Miao Hainan, a giant textile industry and big capitalist of Shandong. At that time, I was very young, did not know him. Someone introduced to know that he went to Hong Kong before liberation, and came back shortly after the Central Committee and the Shandong Provincial Committee. He is a man of integrity, progress in his ideas, and actively advocates the Party's various policies and measures to carry out socialist transformation of capitalist business and industry, and I pay great respect to him. I remember that he was very enlightened in a brand-new lake-blue tunic, and I was inspired to make a good speech at the meeting.' The minds of the Button Badge crossed time, recalling fragments of life more than 50 years ago. During the meeting, he and Mr. Miao Hainan were divided into a group for discussion, because his records were comprehensive. Mr. Miao used him to borrow a transcript of the important speech of the central leadership comrades and prepared to copy it in order to go back to study and convey. Button badge gave him a copy, and he was happy that they had not met again after the meeting. 
In the winter of 1955, a vigorous capitalist industrial and commercial public-private partnership climax began to form throughout the country, central and provincial and municipal levels 'two sessions' organizations (Civil Construction is a democratic party, the Federation is a social group of business enterprises, due to their members and objects Most of them are business people, and the tasks are basically the same, so they It was working together, referred to as the 'two sessions' until 1989.), Responding to the call of the Communist Party of China, under the leadership of the CPC Committee at all levels, actively mobilize its own members to this climax. As a model to take the first step, in 1954 already served as the deputy director of the PPP Dachang silk factory, and was pleased to be at the forefront of the march of the industry and industry, to welcome the upsurge of public-private partnership. Finally, the majority of business and businessmen responded to the party's call, surrendered production materials without exception, participated in public-private partnerships, and achieved a great victory in the transformation of capitalist industrial and commercial socialism. 
Later for more than 20 years, it was another trough of his life. He was beaten as the right, and finally 'contradictions against us as internal contradictions of the people', he was treated with 'two categories'. 
Witness the birth of Hong Kong Huzhou Associations
After the Third Plenum of the 11th CPC Central Committee in 1978, the charges of the right wing were corrected. In June 1981, after the resumption of activities of the Minjian Huzhou Municipal Committee, he was transferred from the silk factory to Huzhou Municipal Committee work, in 1982 as the deputy chairman of the Minjian Huzhou Municipal Committee, 1986 as the chairman, Zhejiang Provincial Committee deputy chairman. In 1983, Jiaxing area was elected deputy director of the first and second NPC Standing Committee of Huzhou City after the withdrawal of the city. 'I have suffered more than 20 years of political grievances, but I have not shaken my faith in the party, because I understand that no political party, government or other regime organization in the world, whether capitalist or socialist, is not. May not make mistakes, and the key is to see how it corrects them. We often say that our party is a great, wise, right party, and that the reason it is great, wise and right, I think is reflected here.' 
At that time, the Central Committee called for greater opening up to the outside world. Cities such as Ningbo, Hangzhou, Wenzhou and other cities were at the forefront. Huzhou Municipal Committee should actively liaise with people of Lake nationality (especially the business community among them), in Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan, and expand the influence of Huzhou among them. Together, the Municipal Committee's United Front Work Department mobilized Liu Shouguang and Li Chengwei Main Committee of Minger Huzhou Municipal Committee (deceased), together to contact Hong Kong under the name of a private family visit. Activities, Button Badge gracefully accepted this glorious task. At the age of 87, his father and matrimonial, Mr. Bo Ni Ping Sun made thoughtful arrangements for the visit of the button in the same way as his nephew. Over 20 days of stay in Hong Kong, under the referral of Mr. Ni Lao, the button has had contact with folks and friends over 100 times. Most of them belong to the middle and upper ranks of the business community, as well as prominent members of the press and publishing industry and intellectual circles, including Jardine Consultant Gan Lin, the old classmate of Nanyang Rong Yen's cousin, General Manager of Hong Kong Nanyang Yijen's cousin Rong Hongqing, Chairman of Hong Kong Book and Stationery Industry Association, General Manager of Litong Books Company Ying, Xu Huiyuan, general manager of Baofeng Insurance Company and silk counterparts Shen Binglin, Shen Shanchen, Shen Shanxun Kunzhong, etc. In addition, the button also met many new people, new friends including their children. Among them are the original owners of Huzhou Lujiayuan Lu Xinyuan descendants, now Hong Kong, the United States and Mauritius have more than ten wool textile mills Asian textile group Lu Zengyong, Lu Zengqi Kunzhong; Huzhou famous calligrapher Wang Yiting's grandson Wang Xiaozhi, Wang Xiaoxing, Wang Xiaoda, Wang Xiaofang, Wang Xiaoren and Wang Xiaoren five Kunzhong. 
In contact, he learned that Huzhou's compatriots, including their children, have no fewer than 2,000 people, but in Huzhou they have ancestral homes, ancestors and relatives, relatives, friends and often come back in Huzhou. However, hundreds of people, accounting for a minority, are of Huzhou nationality but have no ancestral residence, ancestor graves and no relatives or friends in Huzhou, as well as those of Huzhou origin, and later moved to Shanghai and then to Hong Kong and Macao from Shanghai , make up the majority. No matter which part of the people, they have strong feelings about their hometown Huzhou, they are concerned about the fate of their motherland and more about the rise and fall of their hometown. However, after all, they are living abroad for a long time and lack of understanding of everything in the mainland, and they are in different social systems, will inevitably generate some different views. More generally, there is fear of policy change. In particular, some people engaged in business and business fear of socialism against them after Hong Kong's return to the motherland in 1997. Makeover and much more. At the same time, Hong Kong nationals also reflect some practical problems, such as the implementation of private house retreats, and requiring children in mainland China to take over the cause of their parents in Hong Kong. After his return, Niu Guan has responded separately to the relevant government departments, received support and gradually resolved in accordance with the policy provisions, and was embraced by Hong Kong cysts. 
When liaising with the older overseas compatriots, the button has found that it must also pay attention to doing their second and third generation work. The old generation of patriotic patriotism friendship is relatively deep, but most of them are old, their second generation, many people have achieved certain achievements in their careers, but hometown concepts are not as deep as their predecessors, and the third generation is even more so. Some of them even knew that their ancestors were Huzhou, but they didn't know where Huzhou was. In contact, the button also learned that Huzhou compatriots in Hong Kong do not always have the opportunity to contact each other. Therefore, he put forward the proposal to organize Huzhou hometown associations in Hong Kong, which has received the appreciation and support of the fellow citizens in Hong Kong and Huzhou. After more than four months of active preparation, on 7 June 1987, Huzhou Hong Kong Associations Inaugural Meeting was held at Pearl City Restaurant in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. Mr. Ni Ping-sun was elected as the first president. Photos and articles on Huzhou's history and geography and terroir are often seen in newspapers in Hong Kong since then, which have expanded the influence of Huzhou among Hong Kong people. 
On June 25 of that year, Mr. Ni Ping Sun Lao travelled from Hong Kong to Hangzhou, to report to the provincial and Huzhou city leaders on the preparation and future intentions of the association, by the provincial overseas Chinese office and Huzhou municipal committee and municipal government leadership warm reception. At the end of June, Mr. Gu Ganlin led over 70 students, named after his father's uncle Pinggong, to commemorate the 60th anniversary of the scholarship at the Daochang Mountain Cemetery in Huzhou. Mr. Shen Binglin, a Hong Kong manufacturing company, in addition to donating funds to build parks, nursing homes, secondary school science and technology museum, primary school teaching buildings, and rehabilitating hospital inpatient departments in Huzhou City, has also donated funds for the construction of welfare homes and bilang lake tingxie in Huzhou city. Mr. Lu Zengyong, general manager of the Asian-African Textile Group of Hong Kong, and two brothers Zengqi and Zeng Yu, have had little interaction with the Mainland in the past. Through this contact, they knew that their Lujia and Huzhou had a deep historical origin. 
With the joint efforts of Hong Kong and Lake Hong Kong's Huzhou Associations, the meeting has progressed gradually. Zhejiang Province and Huzhou city have repeatedly visited Hong Kong or held in the Mainland, all kinds of economic, trade and networking activities have been supported and helped by peasant associations. The first president, Mr. Ni Pingsun, due to his old age, settled back to mainland China in 1991, living in Shanghai, accompanied by his grandson and granddaughter-in-law for more than 10 years, died in 2001, aged 101. Yulong bearing equipment company operating in Hong Kong, Sun Ni Yongping, has moved to Guangzhou Panyu, and opened a branch plant in Shanghai. During his 10 years of residence in Shanghai, Mr. Ni has always traveled to visit Shanghai until the last moment of his life, despite the deep feelings of 'forgetting the years' from Huzhou. 
Feel the sincere care of the old soup
In 1989, after the civil construction, the Federation of Commerce and Industry Division, due to the need for work, reassigned to the vice president of the Federation of Industry and Commerce, and was elected as the seventh, eighth and ninth National Committee of the CPPCC member. In 1997, he was President of the Provincial Federation of Commerce and Industry and was elected as Standing Committee of the Ninth National Committee of the CPPCC until retirement. 
In this history, individuals have left an indelible influence on the Button Badge. 'In order to transfer me to the province, Mr. Tang Yuanbing, then President of the Provincial Federation of Industry and Commerce, did a lot of work, made many requests to the provincial committee. At the beginning of the transfer, Tang always asked me to focus my work on the provincial business and economic development company that I was also general manager. In order to facilitate good management of the company and save money, I gave up the treatment of cadres living in a new hotel and settled on the top floor of the company. In the middle of summer, the top floor was under strong sunlight, especially hot. At that time, air conditioning was not common, heat during the day, could not go out, and I had to sleep very late. Soup was very concerned, sent watermelon to the fifth floor of the company to cool me, and even sent his own gas tank to me. Time has passed nearly 20 years, the button badge is still clear to remember that moving scene: a drizzle night, Mrs. Tang Laojie Zhang Yuan and Ms. hold an umbrella, walk to the company on the fifth floor to visit the button badge, hush cold warmth. 
In life, Tang is as caring as a loved one's elders, but in thought, politics and work, Tang old as Yan Shi, the button's badge requirements are quite high. One time, Tang said his parting message to a leader of the Democratic Party who is about to raise the central government: 'The promotion of the post of a Democratic Party comrade is a matter of Party training, organizational arrangements, and work needs to be decided upon. There is one side of my own efforts, but can not be complacent by equating the promotion of the job and his existing quality and level. On the contrary, we should face up to their shortcomings, strive to overcome and make progress, in order to truly adapt to new jobs, to meet the expectations.' Soup always speaks this statement to the Button Badge to listen, in fact, an education on the button. After many years, so far sound in ear, the memory is fresh, unforgettable, so that the button badge lifetime inexhaustible. 
The Party attaches importance to and care about the healthy development of a private economy, and it can be seen in its treatment of the private economy in development, from the beginning of using it as a 'useful supplement' to a 'necessary supplement' to 'necessary supplement', from 'component' to 'important part' to 'important part' to written it into the Constitution in 1998; Economic entrepreneurs from the original non-admission to the party, as well as the establishment of private The right to property, and the honorable title given to them as builders of socialism, have been laid down, making political and legal clarity about the status of a private economy. This is the demand of the times and the progress of society. 
During his participation in the meeting of the National Committee of the CPPCC in Beijing, Niu was interviewed by a reporter of the British BB Radio and Television Company. The reporter asked, at the beginning of liberation, you took the lead in applying for public-private partnerships, handing over enterprises to the state, and now actively supporting the country's development of private economy, what are the ideas? And is whether the state's policy of encouraging private enterprise development will change in the future? For the first question, Nou Shang felt that it should be seen that the party had different historical missions in different historical periods. Comrade Ni genshan, male, born in 1927, Liaoning Xinbin County. Family origin staff, own ingredients students. 1949 Entered. Working in 1949. National Economic Committee of the Communist Party of China, March 29, 1986

[Attached 3] Ni genshan: 'Unforgettable Beidarland Seven Tiger Mountains One Night' (Shandong Pictorial Publishing House, 'Old Photos', Series 81)
I was exiled to Beidahuang in the second summer, where the 850 farm, Yunshan Livestock Farm, started distributing food rations by population. It turns out that porridge rotten rice can also be prepared to eat full, now suddenly limited, still have to do heavy work, making it very hungry. The team supervisor deceived us: 'enter the rainy season, the road is bad, the food does not come in, this is a temporary situation.' 
Finally, after the rainy season, the rations are becoming more and more nervous, and finally compressed to seven or two gross food per person per day, synthetic food is still less than 5 or two. There is no explanation for this, and by the fall of 1960, we had been hungry for more than a year. Hard work never interrupts: whole land, sowing, hoe, seedlings, autumn harvest, desolation. Summer to take the heat of grass, fertilizer, cut strips, blanks. Winter with minus 40 degrees cold, planing frozen soil drains, into Wanda mountain logging, burning trees (Wanda Mountain is located in eastern Heilongjiang province, belonging to the Changbaishan mountain range. Nowadays 'Wandashan milk powder' is famous-the original editor's note). Hunger and tiredness make our bodies deteriorate and edema spread like a plague. Good body base, can barely support; poor body base, walking shaking. You realize that the flame of life is about to extinguish, someone on the road glimpse of the head of the cattle gnaws, will quickly pick up and send it to their mouth. One day, people pull a car when feed a small dry corn stick, each length about two or three inches, cooked in a large pot, let everyone eat. I swallowed a full meal, soon abdominal pain, eat corn sticks all spit out; another time, the team boiled a large pot 'millet pumpkin porridge' (in fact, not many rice and pumpkin), let everyone drink, I drank a few large bowls, gastrointestinal swelling, *** shy big water bag, hard to move, had Lying on the hillside, wait for the rice soup to move down. 
At that time, we were willing to be arranged to pick water for the group, and the cooks could enjoy some rice pots or tofu tofu. Personal foreign aid was basically cut off, a partner came to a box of pastries at the home, and received only six small wooden planks and one parcel of leather when they were collected at the post office. Post office officials said the contents of the box were eaten by 'rats' halfway. 
Our group of exiled intellectuals is weakened and spiritually collapsed by starving lives, heavy labor, indifference, discrimination and threats against farm leaders. Tong Aicheng, the principal of a machine department (the first machinery industry), child school, hanged himself, and Cao Zuoren, Ministry of Light Industry, died, and so on. Farm leaders have no hidden heart for us, forced daily pressure: often rumors that people are tortured to death in starvation and fatigue, such as Zhang Jianmiao of the Overseas Chinese Committee, Tu Shuang of the Ministry of Transport, Yang Taiquan, and so on. To solve the tummy problem, we have brains: digging wild vegetables, eating wild plants, stealing raw wheat, corn, soybeans. With these 'opportunities', it will only keep people on the brink of death, and will not save the doom. 
October 13, 1960, an ominous day. We were instructed to go to the four teams of Xiaoyunshan Seven Tiger Mountains to rush the rain to collect Far away, we get up at 3 a.m., eat two big black eggs each, and send two black shoots for lunch. In a hurry, we fumbled in a dark piece of departure. 
In October, the autumn cold has been thick. There was more rain that year, some autumn and flooding, the road was mostly muddy pond, stepped down to the deep mud and calf, shoes tend to fall into the mud, it is difficult to pull out. Everyone went exhausted, only after another to reach the bean field. The day is not light yet, we sit on the ground on standby, and the cold wind blows quiver. 
Open sickle, the gloomy sky drifted down the ground with light rain. Clothes soaked, numbness of fingers, thorough heart bones. Tian Wei is long, not at a glance. Our hearts sink in step. 
I don't know how long, the team site came to order that he could have lunch, take a break after the meal, and then continue to work. 
Two black shoots per person, a few mouths were eaten. Everywhere muddy, water and wet grass, everyone can only stand and rest, when the rain is dense. The sky gradually dimmed down, the gloomy sky still floated with sporadic rain, Tian Lu is expected to come to the end, the team site ordered to close work. Everyone gathered together and ready to withdraw from the bean field. Tanabe has a reservoir, about 20 meters wide, and we had to wade under the pond. Water depth without knee, some places can be with the waist. A few physically unsupported, supported by companions, struggled to the roadside. 
Most people went on the road, and a few were still traveling to the water. Twilight, the instructor and team site several people mention the march for the lead, we embark on the return journey. Behind the people fall farther, the end gradually can not take care of. 
The people behind were anxious, and someone cried in desolation: 'Wait for us in front!' 'Carry out the revolutionary humanism, don't throw us away!' 'Save us...' The voice is getting farther and faint. The voice of Hou Delin, the ancient book publishing house, seems particularly bleak. Teachers and others stopped, held the march and criticized loudly: 'Hurry up, do not rub!' After that, and continue to rush forward, echo several times before and after, finally, all the sound disappeared in the sinking night. An inexplicable sense of terror that struck my heart. 
I realized that the environment here was strange, dark at night, and if left behind in the wilderness, it would get lost, in distress, and even life in danger. 
Then I suddenly saw a black shadow sitting on the roadside. Come closer, it is the National Economic Commission's horse mirror bright. He came with me to Beidahuang. I asked him, 'Ma, what happened? Can you go? Do you want me to help you?' 'All right, I take a break. You go first!' Ma, who has participated in the conversion soldiers who have participated in the fight against the US aid to the North Korean, has raised the opinion of the 'chickens not to lay eggs' during the whole wind movement, and was beaten as a 'right-wing.' I did not expect that his life fire was exhausted and he could never go back to the team site again. 
It was later learned that two of those who had fallen behind fell near the reservoir, and several had been unable to speak out, with partners, barely supporting the way back. In the roadside woods, buddies find weeds and branches, point the campfire, let the seriously ill number sit down on the tree. In the beating light of the fire, the patient's wet clothes rise up strands of hot air, thin pale face makes people worried. At this time, the partner who returned to the team site sent hot soup and, but the patient has not opened his mouth, can only watch his mouth coveted food... When the patient was brought back to the team site, there was a weak nose, the four team health staff came to rescue, only looked, he said indifferently: 'No save!' The voice has just fallen, and the man has gone long. Call for help at the session department by phone, and the answer was: 'Say it tomorrow!' 
This night, including Kong Xianzhong, a faculty member of the Ministry of Commerce who fell near the reservoir and Yang Jun of the design bureau of the Ministry of Light Industry, a total of seven people. In addition to Ma Jingliang of the National Economic Commission, there is also a machine department returning home overseas Chinese, amateur writer Liu Huchen, as well as Tang Yihua, lecturer of the PLA School of Surveying and Mapping, Chen Bolong, and teacher Xu Zhengming. After Liu Huchen came to the beida desertion, he insisted on writing a diary every night, accumulated a lot of material, and had not finished it into books, and people had already sparked their hands. His lover has also been expelled from Beijing and laid down in Baicheng Zi, Jilin. Poor mountain backbone, it is a wife dream man! The article did not die first, often make relatives and friends tears! 
Over the past three years, there have been death, illness, suicide and disappearances on farms, and people have become commonplace. But seven people suddenly died overnight, for the first time. Although the farm is diluted and understated, in our hearts, it still stirs a strong shock, and our lives have been as low as mustard and mustard. Are the seven people who should not have died prematurely, but suddenly died, are not showing us the fate of the surviving ones tomorrow? Faced with the upcoming third harsh winter of Beidahuang, really shudder... [Shandong Pictorial Publishing House published the 'Old Photo' series 81]

memoirs.memoirContent:
【Attached】Du Fujian/Hui Yixian: Ni hengdian: Tongbai Mountain 'Living Dictionary' (2005.7.7)
Recently, with the advanced education activities of Communist Party members, the deeds of Ni hengdian, old party member Ni hengdian in Henan Tongbai Mountain District, are being widely disseminated. 
In the 20,000 square kilometers of Tongbai Mountain District of Henan Province, people struggle to recite the legendary story of an old man: after his leave, disregarding the elderly and weak, trekking the source of the Huaihe River with tenacious perseverance, trail throughout the 18 counties under Tongbai Mountain, a trip 30,000 kilometers, wrote 600,000 words of Tongbai 'Baishanzhi', and in 'Zhongzhou Ancient and Modern', 'Henan Journal of Seniors' and other publications Published more than 30 academic papers, made outstanding contributions to Henan Xinyang, Queshan and Tongbai three counties, and was called the 'living dictionary' of Tongbai Mountain. This old man is Ni hengdian, who left the office of Shi Zhi, Tongbai County, Henan Province. 
'Modo's rest on the rest, dedication to write the spring and autumn; the first fear of the journey bitter, leave history history.' This is a sentiment poem written by the elderly Ni hengdian, and is also a true portrayal of his old life. 
Born in 1930, Ni hengdian was born in a remote small village in Tongbai Mountain District, Henan Province. In January 1949, he took part in the revolution, and was neutral in Tongbai Mountain anti-hegemony struggle. In 1957 he was misclassified as the right, permanently decentralizing labor. In 1979, he has been working in Tongbai County Shi Zhi Office, participated in the revision of local literature such as 'Tongbai County Chi' and 'Tongbai Party History'. Although he is getting older, he never obeys old, like a young man before leaving leave, often alone, carrying a bag, carrying a kettle, carrying dry food, looking in the mountains. 
There is one thing that has made Ni hengdian unable to release. At that time, the State Council and the National Local Chi Office and other leading bodies, respectively, called on Tongbai County to complete the compilation of the 'Tongbai Mountain Chi' as soon as possible, but because the Tongbai Mountains affected five regions, 18 counties and cities of the two provinces, were constrained by a number of factors such as funding problems, personnel problems, organizational problems and other factors. Nor did this be done on the day of rest. It's an unfinished wish for him. After his leave, he was determined to overcome all the difficulties and had to fill that gap with his heart's desire. 
In 1996, Ni hengdian, who has worked for six years, left for six years. As an old cadre who worked before liberation, he could enjoy his old age, but he did not, because that desire was calling him. In April of this year, despite repeated discouragement from his family, he drew up the study and writing articles. He bought maps, compasses, cameras and other equipment, and began to explore Tongbai Hill alone. Repair is a rigorous work, can not hearsay, can not hope Wensheng righteousness. So he looked for the relevant information while looking for Xianda celebrities, trek the mountain and water field examination. He is often alone in the mountains for more than a dozen days; taking photos, drawings, interviews, hungry gnawing dry food, thirsty drinking spring, sleepy wilderness mountains. He wrote in his diary: 'The dragon is still rain, and the old cow knows nothing; the old cow knows the sunset is short, do not have to whip himself.' 
Three counties of Tongbai, Queshan and Xinyang counties are stagnant, river crossings, for a long time, border disputes persist, and villagers in the three areas often flaunt, fights and pleadings, which directly affect social stability. Ni hengdian turned over the mountains, a field visit, extensively verified, and finally identified the junction mountain of Tong, letter and Quesan counties. With this mountain and three river ditches as the dividing line, the borders of the three counties were completely delineated, and received the support of all parties. Ni hengdian reported the revision of the results to the State Council. In 2000, the relevant departments of the State Council, on the basis of his investigation, officially erected a pillar at the junction of Tongbai, Queshan and Xinyang three counties, and named the junction mountain as 77 peaks (due to 770 meters above sea level). Since then, the three conflicts have finally been resolved. 
In this way, during the four years after his departure, Ni hengdian trapped the Tongbai, Tanghe, Zaoyang, Suizhou, Xinyang, Queshan, Biyang and other ten counties and cities, including more than 400 mountains and 200 rivers, including the Tongbai Mountains, and more than 200 rivers in the Tongbai Mountains. Millions of words of survey notes, and published 'Huaiyuan Carol', 'Jin Huaiyuan', 'Tongbai Mountain Range Rover' and other books. 
Morning out mountaineering expedition, twilight pick lamp writing. It lasted 6 and a half years, 'Tongbaishan Chi' finally available. The whole book 600,000 words, 16 volumes, genre based, narrative, history, biography, video combination, supplemented by charts, photos, systematically and factually documented the geomorphology of Tongbai Mountain, mountains and rivers, Buddha culture, species deposits, customs figures, major events and other aspects of the history and current situation. Relevant expert evaluation: This is a large material book that objectively reflects the full picture of Tongbai Mountain. It is of great relevance and far-reaching historical significance for understanding Tongbaishan, protecting the Huaihe source, developing Tongbai, revitalizing the economy of old areas, as well as patriotism education and revolutionary traditional education. 
'Do books seek for name and profit, and the pen always want to benefit the future.' This is a pair of couplings written by the elderly Ni hengdian. The family economy is difficult because of the meager wage alone, coupled with the writing of self-funded visits. The most valuable thing in his family was the 14-inch black-and-white TV that had watched for years, and written in a child's homework book. It was not until 2003 that the county's main leader learned about him, and sent him a free telephone call and sent a color TV. Someone asked him, you for so many years to write 'Tongbaishan Chi' self-purchase equipment, self-digging, self-inflicted hardship, find guilt, figure what? The old man calmly said, 'What do I think? As a national cadre, although I withdrew, I still enjoyed the salaries given by the Party and the people, and I could not eat it in vain. Be able to play the heat in the life of life, do some worthy of the society, worthy of their own, good for the people, leave something for future people, this life without regret.' 
Walk through Aoyama. After the completion of Tongbaishan Chi, Ni hengdian, 76, set a new goal: to complete two works, 'Tongbai Mountain Buddhism' and 'Huaihezhi'. He said, if this task is not completed, I will give it to the next generation, and also to a 'fool'! This is the pursuit of a Communist Party member!
