【Attached】Chen Zhaoxiang: 'Ni Zheng: Founder of Wuyi Qingyuan Tea Cake' (SINA)
Ni zhengzhong, also known as Jinzhang, Fujian famous brand products 'Wuyi Qingyuan tea cake' founder and operator; People's Republic of China was founded in Quanzhou famous social activist; and its tireless, research tea industry, writings, Zhuo Zan family, especially respected by academia, party and political leaders care. 
Ni zhengzhong, origin in Quanzhou, Fujian. Born in October 1915, died on 21 December 1991, at the age of 76. His father Ni Zhiyuan, also known as Honggui, once lived in Wuyishan, Fujian Province, familiar with Wuyi rock tea, and studied Chinese medicine, a monk taught to prepare tea cake recipe, according to the law, with more than 40 leaves of traditional Chinese medicine and Wuyi tea to make tea cake trial, giving friends and relatives to drink, was praised and inspired. So in Wuyishan Qingyuan cave factory, production 'Wuyi Qingyuan tea cake'; and set up 'Hongji Tea Zhuang' in Zhongshan Road, Quanzhou, focusing on the marketing of tea cakes and sales of Wuyi Yan tea. Wuyi Qingyuan tea cake put into the market, get the general welcome from customers. Quanzhou is the center of Jinjiang overseas Chinese hometown, overseas Chinese frequent access, domestic relatives and friends have to buy their hometown specialties to send 'smooth wind' custom, Wuyi Qingyuan tea cake is appreciated by the overseas Chinese, gradually exported to overseas. 
The beginning of the life of tea making
Ni Zheng young by the family, love tea, youth aspiring to study tea profession, parents first approval, have been admitted to Jimei agricultural school, Fuan tea college to study. After graduation, worked as a technician in Chongan tea improvement field, Fuan demonstration tea factory and Fujian agricultural and forestry company tea department. During this period, the famous tea experts Wu Jue Nong, Chuang Laofang, Zhang Tianfu, and so on, have learned the process of making tea cake with his parents. These experiences laid the theoretical and practical foundation for his life in the tea industry. 
In 1932, Ni Fu Zhiyuan died, Hong Kee tea Zhuang by its mother Zhuang Mijuan alone operation. In 1941, Ni Zheng returned home on the orders of her mother. When the quanzhou famous school Pei Shi primary school, the school board of directors is solemnly hired. Many of the principals of private primary and secondary schools at that time did not have available wages, but had yet to try to raise insufficient funds to support the salaries and costs of teaching staff. Ni Zheng is willing to serve as Pei Cai to save the nation, obtain the consent of the family, happy to apply. One year later, because of the high age of her mother, he had to resign as manager of Hongji Tea Zhuang until after the liberation of Quanzhou, the transformation of private industry and commerce and the incorporation of enterprises into state-owned enterprises. 
After Ni Ren tea Zhuang manager, when the market has 'Wuyi Qingyuan tea cake' fake appears, the quality is very poor, but not easy to distinguish from the packaging. This not only affected the goodwill of Hongji, but more seriously, it has hurt the masses. He is determined to severely combat counterfeit goods, he replaced Wuyi tea with Shuiji Daffodil tea, refined Chinese medicine formula, improved production process, updated packaging, affixed special logo, so that customers can easily identify authenticity. The new 'Wuyi Qingyuan tea cake' is better than the previous quality, better efficacy, heat and heat, antipyretic detoxification, refreshing the brain, stomach spleen, help digestion. Soup clear, mellow and fragrant, can be boiled to drink, can also be washed, very convenient, packaging and very elegant, is regarded as home, travel health companion, and is a gift of treasures. The original Wuyi Qingyuan tea cake is cheap and beautiful, than Quanzhou another famous brand product, the price is only one seventh of it. After switching to Daffodil tea, cost reduction is conducive to expanding production, products are exported to the province and abroad, and in Southeast Asia to open new sales points, such as Liao Meifang in the Philippines, New Mirror Shop in Cebu, Singapore Xu Liancheng and Zhuang Zhenniang in Surabaya, etc. During the war of resistance against Japan, especially when Japanese imperialist aggression against Southeast Asian countries, transportation in the Pacific Ocean was cut off, remittances stalled, and overseas Chinese and hometown selling Nanyang's special products were in trouble and could hardly survive, while Wuyi Qingyuan tea cake was worry-free and still stand, because it also had a vast market in the country. After the victory of the anti-Japanese war, remittances were restored, overseas Chinese cycled home, Hongji tea Zhuang business is booming, become a large industrial and commercial household in Quanzhou. The solemn cause has been successful, honourable and generous, willing to work for public welfare and to help those seeking help. 
Serving the business community
As early as his student age, Ni was solemnly influenced by the progressive thinking. After entering society, I felt more deeply the political corruption of the old society, the weak and poor, and the brutal aggression against Japan's imperialism, had a strong patriotic salvation heart. On the eve of liberation, he also received propaganda and education from the underground party members of the CCP. Society must change, and the revolution of the Communist Party of China complies with the hearts of the people. Therefore, he warmly welcomed and supported the liberation of Quanzhou and actively participated in political and social activities. In 1950, he was elected as the first people's representative of Jinjiang County (Quanzhou to 1951 initially established city, formerly Jinjiang County). In May of the same year, the County People's Congress decided to set up a 'Business Research Association', whose task is: to publicize the Party's guidelines and policies in the business community, consult and study to solve major problems in the business community, and prepare for the establishment of the 'Preparatory Committee of the Federation of Commerce' to take over the former Jinjiang County Chamber of Commerce, better for the matter of new democracy Industry services. 34 people's representatives of industry and commerce in the county, and 21 more, as members of the Business Research Association, Ni Zheng acted as the chairman. He unite all members of the Association, reaching out to large, medium and small businesses, working hard to accomplish various tasks. In just three months, the Preparatory Committee for Industry and Commerce was established in August of the same year. Cai Zai-Jing served as the chairman, Ni zhengzhong and Liu Shuhou were deputy chairman members. After the official establishment of the Chamber of Commerce and Industry, the first and second Ni Ren Vice Chairman. The Preparatory Committee of the Quanzhou Municipal Committee of the China National Democratic National Assembly was established, Ni Ren deputy chairman member. In 1957, Ni Yin was mistaken as the right, withdrew the post of deputy chairman of the Civil Construction, Industry and Commerce Federation, and implemented the policy reinstatement after the 'Cultural Revolution'. In 1985, Ni was elected to Quanzhou civil construction five, seven chairmen of the Federation of Commerce and Industry, Quanzhou civil construction six and seven honorary chairpersons, the Honorary President of Quanzhou Chamber of Commerce, until the death of illness. 
In the 50s, the task of the Federation of Commerce and Industry is very heavy, everything has to do fine work. For example, to rectify grass-roots organizations-dozens of trade associations, ideological and political education and learning of party policies, promote production, flourish the local economy, help solve business problems, labor relations problems, help tax work, develop accountants to help build books and so on. The central tasks laid down by their superiors are one after another. Political movements solemnly participate in collective leadership or division of labour, often day and night. The completion of every task in Quanzhou business and industry is inseparable from his efforts. 
At the end of 1950, Ni was named an activist in anti-US aid donation. After the 'Five Counters' campaign in 1952, private enterprises encountered difficulties. The Party and the People's Government called for material exchange, active urban-rural economy, Ni He Federation of Industry and Commerce cadres actively assisted in organizing local products exhibition meetings, and actively participated in 17 material exchange meetings in provinces, lands and counties, and also led by Ni led a visiting delegation to Shanghai and material exchange. The delegation's visit and exchange in Shanghai played a major role in solving the difficulties of private enterprises and the prosperity of the local economy. During the socialist transformation of private industry and commerce, Ni took the lead to handing over Hongji Tea Zhuang and houses together with Wuyi Qingyuan tea cake preparation recipe and law, unreservedly to the leaders of the private restructuring sent by the Party and the Government. 
In 1957, Ni was mistaken as a right-wing, and seriously hit in the Cultural Revolution, but he did not shake his belief in advocating the Chinese Communist Party and taking the path of socialism. 
Promote the development of oolong tea industry
In 1960, Ni voluntarily requested to devolve work on the Qingyuan farm, and then to remain on the farm as a technician until he retired for 18 years in order to have her daughter supplement. On the farm he has been working with the workers, not afraid of dirty, not afraid of hardship, to work for grievances. Management of tea forest, often waving hoe digging, weeding, sweating; tea making process, always rotating with the youth, sleepless, without a little expert scholar and cadre shelf, others do not see that he was a large business and businessman. The cadres and employees of the farm are very respectful of him, seeing that he is older, his body is weak, repeatedly advised attention to rest, just give technical guidance and do not have to take part in manual labor, and he always laughs out, saying, 'Even if my body is not working, I will pick up stones.' He not only actively participates in manual labor, but also uses his rich knowledge and practical experience, personally managing and guiding the breeding of tea, carrying out various process reforms, fruitful. 
In 1980, the farm carried out a loss increase and profit activities, solemnly once again offered the recipe and method of making tea cakes, proposed the farm to set up 'Qingyuan tea cake factory', by He Rong as factory director. As a result, hundreds of thousands of yuan in tax on farm profits for two years, contributing to the farm's losses and profits. In the future, small tea bricks were created, trade exchanges with the Xinjiang Autonomous Region were developed, exchanged or not, and opened up channels for the farm to generate money, and some slow-sold local products in Xinjiang were also exported to Quanzhou region, benefiting each other. 
Solemnly pay attention to the training of talents, hope the farm has a lot of tea technology personnel. He speaks about tea science to the staff at any time and patiently answers their questions. He Rong, the deputy chairman of the Quanzhou Municipal Committee of Minjian, also worked on Qingyuan Farm at that time. Ni encouraged him to drill into tea science, he saw that he had an active role and had chemical expertise. So why dispel the idea of leaving the farm, dive to learn, self-learning. Later, Ni also invited him to participate in tea research activities in the province and abroad, and to discover and examine the history of tea, he is often invited to study together. Therefore, a part of Ni's tea paper was written in cooperation with Ho. 'My son is not interested in tea research, I think of you as a nephew, and in the future I will send all the research materials to you,' Ni said while encouraging him to study tea technology. He is also very concerned about his life and work. That makes why very grateful and brave to move forward. 
Oolong tea has a natural fruity fragrance, mellow taste, color yellow, is one of the treasures of our country's culture, as early as the 17th century has been popular in Europe, 'Western bloom to buy, Wang Qian regardless of official teeth' (17th century Nguyen Minxi's 'Anxi tea song', said that the Chinese people buy tea in the years, afraid they can not buy tea, not (Dare to bargain). In modern times, some countries in the world have also set off 'oolong tea fever', especially in Japan. Oolong tea has the role of summer, heat reduction, cooling, digestive oil, reminding the brain, scientific research believes that it has the function of 'weight loss, beauty, antihypertensive, anti-cancer, prevention of atomic radiation'. Ni has deep feelings for oolong tea, and has a spirit of reform and innovation. He praised the ancient working people who created the oolong tea process. In 1955, he organized tea technicians to experiment and exchange at Yongchun farm to summarize the tea process of Fujian narcissus varieties (narcissus and Tieguanyin are two beads of oolong tea). But he always felt that traditional tea was made by hand, making it difficult to produce and compete internationally, and he was always attentive to finding ways of reform. 
After going to Qingyuan Tea Farm, he studied and reformed the techniques of tea pruning, picking, manufacturing process and white coal roasted tea. 1964 Participated in the design of white coal tea tools successfully, and promoted in Quanzhou, Anxi, so that fuel is not difficult and reduces costs. In 1975, he participated in the development of 'oolong tea bag kneading machine', replacing 'with cloth bag and hand kneading' process with a machine. Oolong tea production to mechanized, semi-mechanized development, is what Ni seeks. In the past, he used oolong tea 'shaping machine' trial production, not ideal, so he was very positive on the development of 'kneading machine'. However, trial production after manufacturing is still not ideal, not comparable to the quality of manual production. In this case, Ni considering the world's tea countries, drinking red tea has become habit for a long time, because foreigners think crushed tea may soon leach all the juice, and striped tea must be brewed two or three times to make the best use; and tea is heavier, tea-shaped secondly, and the appearance of oolong tea is not beautiful. Therefore, he proposed to reform the tea making process to produce crushed oolong tea. This is available in ready-made machines. In September 1977, with the support of Fujian Provincial Bureau of Agriculture (Department), Fujian Province Local Products Import and Export Company and Yuxi District Chinese Tea Company and Foreign Trade Bureau, in collaboration with Yunxiao County overseas Chinese and peaceful farm tea factory, conducted three trial experiments, a total of 7 batches of broken oolong tea samples, reviewed by a number of technicians, and hand We made a comparison, think the mechanism can reveal the unique flavor of oolong tea, taste strong, basically can Maintain the quality characteristics of traditional products. The mechanism can simplify, shorten the production process, improve the refining rate, greatly improve yield and output value, save labor, reduce labor intensity. The sample also through the province foreign trade to Japan and other places cloth samples, get praise. 
In 1978, solemnly understand the quality of red crushed tea in China, due to some natural conditions restrictions, 'thick, strong, fresh' (international requirements), was affected by certain effects, export is not good. He considered that oolong tea has high fragrance characteristics, and has always used a variety of tea to improve the quality of the practice, suggested that through the test, in black tea in a certain proportion mixed with broken oolong tea, thus shaping the unique flavor of red tea in China, improve the international status of red tea in China. In the same year, and Sichuan Tea Research Institute collaborated, 'floral red crushed tea' was successful. 
Writings quite apocalypse
The spring breeze of reform and opening-up of the CPC Central Committee blows across the land of the motherland. In addition to his own proposals for various reforms through the organization and the mobilization of members of the Civil Construction and Commerce Federation to put forward the reform ideas widely, he also boosted the opinions of their peers in tea, and raised the issue of reforming the tea production and marketing system. He made specific recommendations on the situation and some problems of increasing the annual production of tea by 50,000 tons of tea in Fujian province since 1979, from administrative management, business management, production, side selling, domestic sales, export, taxation and Chen tea treatment. He was very anxious to deal with Chen tea backlog in the country, specially proposed to deal with Chen tea: 1, cut prices marketing; 2, pay attention to custody; 3, at home and abroad have the habit of drinking Chen tea, can be widely sold; 4, made of medicinal tea, such as tea cake, weight loss tea, pressure tea, quit tea, etc.; 5, made pressure Tea side pin and seek to sell to the USSR. Also put forward a series of proposals to improve oolong tea products, such as rational picking, improving primary quality, promoting the elimination of inferior species, changing the layout of varieties, restoring traditional camping technology to improve the quality of medium and lower grade tea. He made a series of recommendations, and at that time he had been diluted, sick, difficult to walk, and even more valuable. 
In the 70s, Ni also focused on the history of tea. He saw that a university textbook says 'black tea first and then oolong tea', which is quite different from what he has developed over the years from historical materials. He thinks that China created black tea and oolong tea two kinds of tea, who first and who is the issue, is an important part of the development history of tea making process, related to the growth and fall of tea in China over 100 years, for the current expansion of export, tea making modern, is not simply proof and drill horn tip. So he collected information extensively, without hard work, not afraid of difficulties. He made a special trip or use various opportunities to check the literature in various parts of the province and abroad, and reproduced more than 800,000 words of information about tea history in China and abroad. On this basis, he took a strict attitude of governance, and invited He Rong to work together to write 'Oolong tea first, black tea in the back' article, published in 'Chinese tea' in 1979, the fourth issue, from the positive argument: Wuyi Yan tea is the ancestor of oolong tea, produced in about the 17th century, The name of oolong tea was only appeared in the 1840s; the method of black tea was evolved by the oolong And that came. This paper aroused the attention of China's tea industry, leading to a useful academic contention. Next year, Ni and He Rong once again wrote 'Oolong Tea First, Black Tea in the Back' article to justify this argument with a richer and more conclusive information. The tea community generally considers these arguments to be insightful and valuable. 
In addition, in order to make tea management learn from, absorb useful, abandon mistakes, Ni widely collected information, combined with practical experience, studied the situation of the previous famous brand tea, wrote the 'Fujian overseas Chinese tea history', 'Minnan tea history', 'Taiwan oolong tea and Quantai trade', etc. More than 40 articles over 1.2 million words, of which more than 30 were published in tea publications and Literary and historical publications, others are sent to relevant parties for reference. In the summer of 1990, the Minjian Quanzhou City Committee set up 'Ni Zheng Zheng Tea Theory' editorial group, selected and published the book 'Ni Zheng zheng tea industry', Yongchuei his achievements in the tea industry, and let readers receive lessons. The book was compiled in 19 articles, with a total of more than 110,000 words. 
Ni was unable to work properly because of illness, but still insisted on studying the history of tea, doing the work of liaising with Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macao compatriots, and actively contributed to the holding of the 1990 Fujian and Taiwan Tea Symposium. 
Ni's solemn dedication is outstanding. Accumulation of business and industry, in the 50s of the private transformation to the country; the energy and time after the liberation decades were all dedicated to work, where the party arranged, he went there, well completed the task; his knowledge, all dedicated to the tea industry. His life has always been frugal, not greedy, undisputed status. In business, in academia, he is a typical one.

【Attached】Yuan Ling: The Yu Hui of Dongwu Fatong
Centennial rule of law
The Tokyo trial, the five constitutional drafts, the founding of the School of Comparative Law, and the reform of the Republic's judicial reform, and the spectrum of modern Anglo-American law enlightenment, legal education, constitutional exploration and national independence, added a missing dome to the temple of modern law. Projected into the current reality of the rule of law. 
On June 8, 2013, during a rush lunch in mentor Pan Han-dian's residence, the topic of Bai Sheng, an associate professor at the Chinese University of Political Science and Law, was as usual for most of the years: Business Printing Library intends to translate the German American scholar Bodenheimer Law while studying a graduate student at Soochow University Law School nearly 70 years ago The original book of Science reprinted, Bai Sheng recorded the manuscript electronically Document, 93-year-old Panhan Dian is undergoing intense proofreading of clear samples. 
'I don't know how to save for so many years, today can come out.' Mrs. Panhandian said with emotion. 
The first time I saw the manuscript, Baisheng some dared to start. The paper page of this brush issue has been yellowed and crisp, seems to be unable to read, but the neat pen writing is clear. 
The old manuscript is still in place, and its birthplace-the main building of Dongwu University Law School, founded in 1915 at 146 Kunshan Road, Shanghai, after the faculties of 1952, underwent political frost and time erosion, now faded, becoming a city bustle of finance night school. Only the tall arcade and the fourth floor deep auditorium revealed the temperament of the first law school in China. 
There is no sign of the site on the night school, and the self-examiners who go to classes know little about the past of the building. History is like old walls have been repainted once, and all names and plots have been brushed off. 
But there's always something that remains like that manuscript, waiting to be rediscovered. In recent years, with the opening to the outside world and the return of constitutional rule of law, the connotation of 146 Kunshan Road has been discovered a little bit, and people gradually appreciate the irreplaceable weight of this four-story building in the century-old history of the rule of law. 
In just over 30 years ago in 1949, Sooh Law School trained a generation of legal elites, including a large number of prominent lawyers, seven members of the Legislative Council of the National Government, almost all Chinese legal advisers in Tokyo trials, and several judges of the International Tribunal. The reputation of 'Chaoyang (out of the judge)' has a profound impact on the rule of law in the Republic. 
Dongwu Law School has a prominent position in modern law circles, from the nomination of academicians of the first Central Research Institute in 1947: Six nominees in the legal profession, including Wang Chonghui, Guo Yunguan, Li Haopei, Wu Jingxiong, Wu Jingxiong, among whom the younger generation of Wu Jingxiong and Li Haopei are all trained by Dongwu Law School of graduates. 
Not only that, Wu Jingxiong, Sheng Zhenwei, Yang Zhaolong, Ni zheng, Xiang Zhejun, Li Haopei, Ethan, Lu Jun, Pan Han-dian... These names that have been lost and obliviated in the empirical flow of the rule of law, together with the Tokyo trial, the five constitution and the founding of the School of Comparative Law, and judicial reform in the Republic of the Republic, and so on, were once again united and painted. From modern Anglo-law enlightenment, legal education, constitutional exploration and national self-reliance Spectroscopy, complementing the temple of modern law with a missing dome and projecting a precious afterglow into the current reality of the rule of law. 
In this afterglow, there is a grand festival such as the drafting of the Basic Law of Hong Kong and the performance of the International Court of Justice in The Hague, and more, as Pan Han-dian said in the 'Origin' of the Common and French Dictionary of Yuan according to 'Origin', in personal troubled encounters, 'proud bones remain, do not waste and work for the State of the State', making common law and the common law and the comparative legal blood of the common law. bleak insist. Such insistence, the law of eventually feeding the current congenital anaemia, will continue the legal inheritance that has been cut off by politics. 
In recent years, with the publication of Yuanzhao English-American and American Dictionary and Dongwu Xianxian Law Series for the first time, as well as the rediscovery of Yang Zhaolong, Shing Zhenwei and others, marked the quietly return of the 'Dongwu legal system' after the wave of robbery. 
'Town Counter', 'Bathing' and Adjustment
On the night of April 27, 1951, the 36-year old Soow Law School turned straight. 
On this night, Shen Zhenwei, acting president and dean of the law school of Dongwu University, was arrested at his residence at 39 Fumin Road, Shanghai. Also arrested were former Provost Esen, director Liu Langquan, Professor Ai Guofan, Lin Wo-Peng, Guo Yunguan and Dongwu graduates Gao Wenbin and others. 
This is a unified 'anti-town' remedial lesson in Shanghai, mainly aimed at the principal and professors of old universities. 
On the evening of April 27, the Shanghai Municipal Military Management Council and the municipal government organized 4,445 action teams comprising the army, police, cadres, workers, and students, and about 36,000 people. After midnight, a net-pull raids were carried out across Shanghai and detained more than 8,000 people in one run. 
Prior to the repeated political operation, the law school has left the law school in the midst of the storm, and no one would expect the Military Control Council to do so. [Wuyi Three Press: Who are they? Why is it so hateful to the Chinese people, education to China, to Chinese universities, and to Chinese intellectuals!] 
'I was well informed, but I didn't hear any wind.' 89 years old Xu Shengqing said. He was the President of the Student Union of Dongwu Law School. Due to the extreme confidentiality of the news, there have also been rumors that public security personnel turn walls into school and take people away. 
Afterwards, according to the arrangements organized by the underground party, Xu Shengqing announced the arrest of Shing Zhenwei and Osen at the full school student conference. Over the years, the students present at that time were still unforgettable. In their impression, some of the deans who were too serious were pure scholars, and the Provost was a passionate mentor of the ancient trail. 
In fact, since 1950, the rejuvenation of serving as a president since the war of resistance has left the school and the teaching of evidence law, and only English is taught. Osen was also removed from the post of Provost. Changes in the political climate have made history complex and less 'progressive' they are no longer fit to preside over school. Well, Ni zheng, who was born from Dongwu, took over as the provost, and invited his brother Yang Zhaolong from Nanjing University to serve as dean, struggling to maintain it. 
Liu Langquan, director of training, became the target. In September 1950, the Law School sent an application to the East China Ministry of Education to hire three people including Liu Langquan as political class teachers. Only Liu Langquan was not approved. He was replaced by an old district cadre assigned by his superior. 
At a time of upheaval, management candidates are just one of the problems encountered by Sooh Law School. Under the new policies of 'abolishing the old legal system' and 'eliminating imperialist cultural aggression', the law school of the Church University of common law and a common law tradition faces death. 
In 1950, the Ministry of Education of East China notified the Sooh School of Law to stop recruiting postgraduate students and asked for curriculum reform. The summary report of Dongwu Law School to the East China Ministry of Education in March 1951 on curriculum reform, retained by Shanghai Municipal Archives, contains the following statements:
'After liberation, all kinds of reactionary courses have been abolished... In accordance with the spirit of the resolute abolition of the pseudo-six law, many unnecessary courses have been eliminated, and credits for courses such as civil, commercial law and procedure law have been reduced as appropriate-but they still do not have certain guidelines, especially in the Faculty of Law, which is particularly difficult.' 
Ni zheng is one of the signatories of the report. Together with Yang Zhaolong, he tried to preserve the comparative lawfulness of Sooh Law School while adapting to the times. At the end of the report, the Dongwu Law Department has a team of international law, which trains diplomats and administrative staff with a legal foundation, thus focusing on courses in the law of several international organizations and treaties. This is an attempt to replace the 'practical' function of common law for survival under the new regime. But this bitterness is only a fantasy in the context of 'one side down'. Once the curriculum reform program is reported, there is no following. 
Jiang Yunhua, who graduated from Soochow University at the end of 1951, recalled that she had little knowledge of English and American law at that time. 'It is only two years to actually read the law, and in the third year, the old law cannot be learned. There is nothing to talk about, but only political and revolutionary history. Year 12 studied the common law syllabus. It was originally going to the fourth grade of intensive school, and did not study. Those two years, students were mixed!' Jiang Yunhua said. 
The main element of 'mix' is to participate in various sports. The political movement was well developed before 1949, and the CCP underground party was well organized. Xu Xibo, who was in love with his classmate Jiang Yunhua at that time, recalled that he 'followed the run' in the form of leaflets, singing revolutionary songs, welcoming the PLA into town, crying out the American Emperor, defending the Soviet Union, and including the use of a fellowship in the form of church organization. 
According to the Law School's report, students participate in any movement, on average thirty or forty at a time. After 1949, the number of people per sport doubled to about 780. The total number of students at Soochow Law School at that time was 571. 
There was a contradiction between the student union and the school. Xu Xibo, as a student council member, went to the promotion before leaving office for a meeting for his home. He remembers Shing to be persuasive and must read well. But at that time, 146 Kunshan Road has actually been unable to put a calm desk. 
Beyond the political movement, there has been a lot of chaos. In January 1951, in January 1951, the Law School reported in a report to the East China Ministry of Education on the restructuring of the school style, that after Liu Langquan left his job and the old training system was abolished, some students blatantly disturbed the order, broke into the classroom, and even molded the girls, 'the school is in a deep crisis'. Although the law school took severe measures to dismiss several undisciplined students, it was not possible to restore the tranquility of its former campus. 
The apprehension of others and the ensuing reformation campaign have increased the level of vigilance among the teacher community. Yang Zhaolong's daughter Yang Liming went to Shanghai High School in the summer of 1952, living with his father in the school staff dormitory. Yang Zhaolong instructed her not to contact her neighbors. Yang Liming found that the people around them were nervous, feeling just something big. 
In the files of the existing Dongwu Law School, Ni zheng, together with the student union cadres, was kept to visit the country's land reform and anti-U.S. aid, and Yang Zhaolong sent a letter to the East China Ministry of Education to convey information on land reform policy. In the land reform, a piece of land in Jiangwan, which was donated by a gentleman to Dongwu Law School for the construction of the library, was divided into land reform. 
The winds of the 'Three Counters' and 'Five Counters' also slightly blown into the walls of schools that are not high. But what is more important is the rethought movement in early 1952. This is a universal political movement across the country against the intellectual community, which is portrayed as 'bathing'. 
Lu Jinbi, who studied at Nanjing University at that time, recalled that NANU, as behind the Central University, had a very strong exercise. Not only was the lecture lecture criticized by the exhibition, but also cried in front of students for examination. 
Soochow Law School is also a key area. According to the memoirs of Ni zheng, teachers were concentrated in the school and examined in two groups, detailing the curriculum vitae and the process of thinking change. The decision on 'customs clearance' is in the hands of the Party members and cadres stationed by the working group. At this point, the communist organization, which has been underground, is really public. 
At that time, Gao Chengde had just graduated from Dongwu Law School as an assistant professor. He generally reviewed his past bourgeoisie thinking and coveted to enjoy. The old teachers, on the other hand, need to criticize themselves in the service of the reactionary government and even join the Kuomintang's history. Xu Shengqing recalls that he and student party branch head Zhuang Yongwen and others on the criteria for crossing the customs clearance of teachers. For teachers with complex social and professional relations, he thinks that they come from the need to support their families, as long as critical ideas become, Zhuang and others require strict control. 
The new president Yang Zhaolong, who served as acting as the National Government Attorney General, has become the focus of ideological reform, and even was reported to have hidden a box of gold. It was actually a bookcase that he carried when he returned home. 
Yang Liming recalled that working group staff Wang Mingyuan came home to find Yang Zhaolong and asked him why he had mentioned during the examination that Chiang Kai-shek had dinner, underground party member Wang Xiao and the death penalty case for sabotage of Yangshupu power plant. The latter said that the former had the intention to show off, while the latter was routinely signed with Yang as the Attorney General at the advice of Chiang Kai-shek Mega dragon has nothing to do, do not have to Yang Liming understands that Wang Mingyuan means protecting Yang Zhaolong. However, Yang Zhaolong was finally caught in the case of Wang Xiaolong. 
Xu Shengqing said that after the transformation of the mind, the relationship between teachers and students was completely upside down and cold: students were active in silence, 'dare not to speak out, fear being reported.' I usually meet, the teacher laughs with the students, and stay away. In this precarious campus, a deep gulf has been drawn between the fate of most teachers and students. In December 1951, the graduation of the class in Eleacheng, front or squat or standing students are angry, and Yang Zhaolong and Ni zheng, standing in the back row is melancholy.

Based on the experience of the Tokyo trial, Ni zheng stressed that individual crimes could not be blamed on the State and should bear separate obligations. Since then, the United Nations established the International Criminal Court, which directly contributed to the trial and accountability of Milosevic, Gaddafi and others. 
The following year, Ni zheng was elected a judge of the International Court of Justice in The Hague. This was the first judge of the United Nations Court of Justice in China since 1949. Subsequently, Li Haopei, Dongwu Xuejian, served as a judge of the International Criminal Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia. Both were nearly nine years old when they were elected. Together with Wang Chong-hui, the first United Nations judge, Dongwu Law School contributed three judges of the International Tribunal, which is also unique in the history of modern rule of law. 
After the end of the 'Cultural Revolution', the legal system was rebuilt, and civil law scholars, mainly with the Liusu community, stepped out of the dust of history and became a central pillar. The group of Anglo-American law scholars represented by Dongwu Tongmen, although still marginalized as a whole, is still marginalized, but in the demand of the era of opening up to the outside world, has been ordered and shining. This became a collective portrayal of the situation of the Dongwu people after the Cultural Revolution. 
In 1979, Jiao Shaoheng, a professor at the Shanghai Institute of Foreign Languages, was recruited to serve as adviser to the Special Court of Jiang Qing and Lin Biao's Anti-Revolutionary Group Case. At the hearing, Jiang Qing's court loud rebuked the judge, causing the trial to run out of control. Qiao Shaoheng was ordered and stuck into the data room to find the case of 'eviction of the defendant convicted' in the US court. Since then, Jiang Qing was expelled from the court, responding to the concerns of international public opinion. Six years later, the withdrawal of Hong Kong was put on the agenda, and Cao Shaoheng was elected to the Drafting Committee of Hong Kong's Basic Law. Also on the committee is Wong Yuk Lun, a graduate of Soochow Law School. Gao Chengde introduced, proficient in comparative law, English and excellent Huang Yulin, in the drafting of the basic law has the power of 'carrying'. 
In 1984, a private economic legal advisory body called 'Revitalizing Company' was established in Shanghai. The chairman of the company is Xu Panqiu, former president of East China University of Political Science and Law. Directors, consultants, consultants and consultants have accommodated more than 200 legal scholars, most of them are Dongwu teachers and students, such as Sheng Zhenwei, Li Wenjie, Qiao Shaoheng and others. Ni zheng, who went to The Hague as an international judge, learned that the teacher was 'out of the mountain' and sent a message of 'gratitude, comfort and encouragement.' Xu Heber served as the company's liaison director and often went to Shen Zhen to send consultancy fees to his home. Shengzhen is because he was arrested before the faculty adjustment, there is no retirement salary for the unit. After serving as consultant to the East China University of Political Science and Law and the revitalization of the company, life in old age has been guaranteed. 
Revitalizing the company has established law firms and foreign economic legal advisory center. In 1990, the Institute of Comparative Law Further Education was established. It has trained a large number of international civil and commercial legal talents, and has played a catalytic role for the opening up of Shanghai's economy to the outside world. 
In 1993, Sheng Zhen received the Silver Star Medal of Honor for the Administration of Justice issued by the Ministry of Justice, commending his contribution to legal education. On 22 April 1997, Shengzheng passed away and finished a rough life. 
A few days before his death, he was also involved in the review of the Sino-French Dictionary of Yuan Zhao. This is a collective work of the Dongwu Tongren community after the disappearance of Dongwu Law School more than 40 years later. As early as the Shanghai island era, Osen organized four students such as Pan Han Dian to compile a English-American and French dictionary. More than 50 years later, Pan Han-dian, as the chief review, and young scholar Xue Bo have sought out the old Dongwu people living in Shanghai and participated in the compilation of the dictionary. Under his visit, he learned that the old people of Dongwu Law School are in a humble situation and do not waste their studies, 'there is a sense of sense, revealing reverence.' 
These old people, who have lost their lives, put their energy and effort into this large dictionary, which has not received any official funding, but filled the gap in history. In addition to Pan Handian, Ni zheng, Yao Qi-type, Lu Jun, Yang Tieliang, Cai Jin, Xu Kai-shu, Gao Wenbin, Yu Weiyi, Gao Chengde and other 20 people. In addition, Qiao Shaoheng and Huang Yulin participated in the proposal. During the six-year dictionary editing and publishing process, most of the reviewers on the list had gradually died. With more than 4.6 million words, this dictionary contains more than 45,000 entries, three times more than the English-French dictionaries published in Japan, making it an indelible tombstone for the old people of Dongwu. On the title page of the dictionary, the title reads 'This book is dedicated to Alma Mater and the Motherland'. 
Beginning in 2005, Soochow University, behind Soochow University Wang Jian Law School, began editing and publishing 'Dongwu Law Pensor Series'. East Wu Xianxian income of Wencong has a total of nine, including Yang Zhaolong, Ni zheng, Li Haopei, Wang Chonghui, Pan Handian, Wu Jingxiong, Qiu Hanping, Sheng Zhenwei and Sun Xiaolou, so far the top five volumes have been published, including Pan Handian is the only living person. 
After the publication of Yang Zhaolong's collection in 2005, 'Dongwu Law', a unique tradition in modern law history, began to be rediscovered from beneath the strata, becoming a good medicine for the relief of mental anaemia in the current legal profession, and an unobsolete academic benchmark. In a long article written by scholars Gao Jishun, Xu Zhangrun and others, the value of 'Dongwu Tradition' has gone beyond purely academic and legal levels to the moral and spiritual heights of modern and contemporary intellectual circles. 
It is unimaginable that it was the afterglow of a law school that disappeared for more than 60 years. (Full text finished)

memoirs.memoirContent:
[Attached] Wang Shaogeng: 'Party wind and anti-right struggle in 1957' (Yan'an Hongyun)
In the first half of 1957, the Central Committee issued a notice that the whole party was rectified: 'This is mainly to criticize several wrong ideological style and work style: one is subjective, one is bureaucracy, and one is sectarianism'. At the beginning of the wind, the Central Committee also invited the democratic parties to help the Communist Party to rectify the wind in order to reflect mutual supervision and photograph. The top figures of very individual democratic parties misunderstood the party's sincere desire and made a series of overstated statements that, after being published in the newspapers, caused some intellectuals to make successive difficulties to the party. The People's Daily then published an editorial 'Workers Speak', calling on the working-class to act and resolutely crush the rampant attacks of the bourgeois right. In this regard, the whole wind in the party stopped, and turned into anti-right struggle within the city (not conducted in the countryside). Any speech article involving attacks or criticism of the 'three red flags' (overall route, great leap forward, cooperation), or overly aggressive criticism to leaders at all levels is regarded as 'right-wing rhetoric'. Serious characterization as right-wing elements. Municipal Committee (Jinhantai District), designated me as the head of the anti-right struggle at the government level, and I was the head of the government office. For a long time, overall, this is the case, I continue to consider.

memoirs.memoirContent:
【Attached】Macondo: 'Gourmet' (Internet)
In the late 1980s, while I was still studying, I knew that China had a Nie fengqiao Fengqiao studying food culture. He was an old right, who was then devoled to Qinghai to do a job of finishing ancient books in the library. This job could be an accident for him. Since you can't ask politics or do sensitive learning, let's study on diet. It is said that every food, he made a stack of cards from ancient books. That kind of learning, only he came to do it. After the Cultural Revolution, he opened a column in various dietary magazines. Because he and my classmates are in a school, my classmate is the head of the culinary department. So I began to focus on his article. I think that the old man (the associate professor was in the end of his life), did not eat much food, but his dietary text was undoubtedly gorgeous and colorful. Most of the subsequent dietary articles were deduced from his essays. Unfortunately, he died a few years ago, and China's food culture was a little less glorious. 
My brethren fell in love with food culture because of him, and I, uh, have been somewhat affected. Later, after graduation, I had the opportunity to make a revision of food therapy entries for a national dictionary. It seems to have 100 therapeutic food items, which is one of my academic achievements. I remember that the draft fee was 300 yuan. Of course not high, just talk better than nothing. 
And because of this, I am not ignorant about eating this line. I remember that someone opened a pharmacy in Hefei at the earliest, and asked me to be a consultant, and I prepared a recipe for this. However, this pharmacy eventually collapsed, after all, it was excluded in Hefei. Well, what kind of medicinal meal? If it's not good, can you eat it well? Not to mention the good medicine meal, there is always some odor in. 
Gastronomy and become home, I don't know much. Mr. Zhang Qiangmin, Chairman of Shengson Group, is one. Once, at the Xuanwu Hotel, it was a four-star hotel, my brother invited. Because he had not seen it for a long time, he had a little bit of power, began to abuse, ordered abalone and got shark's fin. As a result, Mr. Zhang tasted abalone taste, said it was not done properly, and then analyzed, how not, which process went wrong. It was said that my schoolmate called the chef out immediately, and it was certainly said by Mr. Zhang. I admire this ability to know the problem at a glance. He later saw him several times to review dishes, all at the point. Every surprise in the seat, it is known that this person is alive in the taste of food. 
There are also many gourmets in folk. They tend to be hands-on, and some may make only one meal in their lifetime; others are only good at doing a few things. An older brother of Anqing, I know, has always been a chef at home. He cooked the dishes, and he did not even speak of debut, just intuitively. He made braised beef is a must. Later, I said, this braised beef can occupy the Hefei market. An old lady, a graduate of Jinling Women's University, is seven years old, because one of the people I reported had a colleague background with her, so we knew. After knowing, her husband told me that his old companion broiled duck was the most beautiful taste. He tastes all the houses, none of them. Let me be sure to taste the dish she made. This brings my taste. Is there such a great sauce duck? One day, the old lady is interested, and slowly stew at home. When I arrive, this sauce duck is premature. Later end up, a yellowish sauce duck lying in the plate, the entrance is rotten, the taste of fruit is truly pure and beautiful. This sauce duck, I think I can only eat one or two times in my life. 
Not long ago, I heard that a certain alley sells braised beef, said that only sell one or two hours a day, each time the queuing is very crowded. There are even queues to buy. Because many small and medium-sized hotels, are directly to the store to purchase. The shop is a partnership of five people. It is said that the profit of selling braised beef in a month alone is as high as 500,000 yuan. However, when I heard, I still dare to go, one is afraid of the bitter queuing, the two are afraid of what can't be seen in that delicious thing.

Nie guangchi Guangdi, male, 49 years old, Hunan Hengshan people, family origin landlord and business capitalist (grandmother is a traitor Zeng Guofan's daughter, to marry Heng Feng yarn factory); my composition senior staff, recruitment in 1956, intelligence research institute editor.

In the 1953 general election in Shanghai, private printed candidate materials were distributed everywhere in an attempt to incite a group of people to oppose a candidate to undermine the election, and the government's leniency only allowed them to review the matter.

The previous week saw all kinds of flowers in the hospital, the heart has a kind of unspeakable pleasure, remembering 'before the people planted trees, later by the cold' words, but the shortage of flowers or trees are blooming, fewer flowers, not dense foliage, and not much, flowers thank you. This is up to the collective efforts of every comrade of us here today. Now is the spring season, some days before the wind every day, blowing sand cover the unpleasant day, but yesterday and today's weather is really exciting, when we feel very pleasant, let us think of 'flowers altogether' to be a 'flower messenger' to make the spring breeze a light rain, good Let all sorts of eye-catching flowers open through the premises of our intelligence house. 
I would like to quote a poem made by a comrade who participated in 1942, after studying the wind:
Between comrades and comrades, between stars and stars,
Not squeezing each other, but shining each other. 
I appreciate the meaning of this poem, because I think that the relationship between comrades will always be more intimate, not only should be a wish, but also a fact that some of us may die, some go far away, not easy to see, we are still together, cherish each other. We have now seen the beginning of socialism, knowing that it is not a distant ideal, so we are more united and work together for the smooth realization of this highest ideal. Therefore, we must ask our party to strengthen its strength, and the party's power is the expansion of unity. To unite all forces that can be united, there must be broad and correct views, ideas and practices, so we must rely on everyone to make their opinions and make appropriate criticism from the desire for unity. So that all the comrades can be filled with the love of comrades. Therefore, I think that serious and stormy approach is correct and necessary. 
For the contradictions within our unit, my personal view that the main contradiction is between leadership and being led for two reasons:
1. I feel that one of our biggest drawbacks from the preparation to the present day is that the positive leadership is always trapped in the mudpit of administrative transactivism, causing the price to be busy in personnel, affairs, budgets, budget estimates, making statements, planning transactions, and not noticing that some key fundamental problems should be solved So work chaos, passive, caught sesame mung beans, lost watermelon, put the 'administration In the first place, ignoring the planning tasks, not starting from its own business, forming a general institutionalization. Some comrades even say that our research unit that does practical work is like a Yamen. In it, Director Yuan Dai has the main responsibility, because he personally participated in scientific planning meetings., particularly with regard to the discussion and drafting of mandate 57, his history and history of the establishment of the Intelligence Unit should be said to be It is quite clear, however, our establishment has been eight or nine months, even for almost a year. Let's ask how many achievements we have today? We have received so much funding from the government, so many cadres, and can I say that I have failed to live up to the great mission entrusted to us by the Government? I think it's time to check out our mission. First of all, we want to ask, is it enough to do it? In the past stages, a little bit of work was done, why didn't you do well enough? Can't be done in time? Quantity and quality are problems. Analyze the reasons. My personal feeling is that Mr. Yuan is not in a hurry, he is also very demanding, hoping that our intelligence can indeed play a role in marching into science, as he said in the planning meeting, but he wants to be an official, he knows his society. There will be too many activities and part-time, can not put the spirit of full payment in the place, so he wanted to take care of, think to put a part of the responsibility to Comrades of party members will always be wrong. This will result in an opportunity for a small group headed by 'Comrade Zhou Junlie' to grasp the power inside. As a result, over time, he himself gave up his leadership and turned into a 'senior democracy' with responsibilities and responsibilities. 
We think the general ability to work is not high enough, business experience is not enough, in the early days of groping, feel rusty, small hands and feet, these are unexpected, not surprising, but surprising is to stay in a state that does not go back, a little hurry, swallow, call people It is not necessary to be urgent, this kind of practical needs in the face of specific work, Instead of saying that others have committed impatience, chatted to decouple him and said, 'Come slowly, will get good'. I repeatedly told the party organization that I should not be satisfied with a little superficial performance in front of your eyes, but should be drastically to improve the status quo and solve some of the main problems. However, Comrade Zhou was idle every day., Take a good time, Director Zhao goes earlier than anyone else, and may come a little later, and after work, put the matter of a real intelligence firm. Throw to the back of the brain. Comrades of other party members play circles on personal issues every day, nor must they really think about the work of the Intelligence Institute. However, some people have circled in their brains every day for some problems on their work, they can't be solved, and they can't talk to the party's responsible comrades, always have no essentials, all things are dragged, not hurried. Resolving in a timely manner makes it very difficult for people who do specific work. I think this should be the main responsibility of Director Yuan. However, as far as my personal experience is concerned, although Director Yuan is busy, but things come to him, always give you a solution immediately, and he can also take the initiative to think of some problems for my scope of work, and instruct me to do it at any time. Instead, the office is actually leading my work, but gives My work has caused a lot of difficulties, not only being unaware of but not giving the minimum trust and necessary support. As for caring, understanding and care, that's not much more, I want to push myself and people, the hearts of any intellectuals are the same. They only want leaders to face up to their labor and respect their labor, but in our situation, I feel it is difficult for the intellectuals to fully play him. This kind of administrative transactivism makes our work an organ, a gate, which is the root cause of all contradictions. 
Secondly, I would like to touch on the form of our organization. I think that the current structure seems to be to cut a whole block into three segments, and the top level of the director, the director (who was missing at that time), the director himself placed on the time and energy of the director himself was both limited, one was not correct Comrade Zhou, who is not well spoken, likes to act on behalf of some of the directors, as well as comrade Zhou. Comrade, they are called comrades who lead the collective leadership. In addition to the following several chambers, a few leaders have more or less problems with their ability to lead organizations. Imagine that a unit's organizational system is divided into such three segments, not ventilated. Usually there is little opportunity to study the work carefully, analyze and discuss it. How much power is such a leadership? Work is not practical, not in-depth and meticulous, what else? Therefore, my personal opinion is that there is a need for a thorough study of correction. 
Director → Editor-in-Chief → Digest, Index → Several Professional Groups → Letters, News

There is no need to put similar competency conditions in various departments, making appropriate use of each of their strengths. 
The above are the two root causes of my inconsistencies: (1), there is no consensus on the ideological understanding, we can not see clearly the purpose of becoming a unit, mobilizing and concentrating all the forces around the needs of business work, to specifically solve various key issues, and then according to According to our conditions and strength, put our planned work tasks in quantity and quality Complete certain indicators. Building a socialist society and realizing the lofest ideals of mankind. As a result, Nie guangchi Chongzhi unfortunately won the bid, became the right, and he was sent to the Beijing switch factory for labor without completion of his studies. At the same time, hundreds of university students have been allocated labor. A year later, people offered to deport them to the Great Northwest, but were stopped by Comrade Peng Zhen (then Mayor of Beijing). Comrade Peng Zhen knows that these people are academic tips, very smart, and can be handy to stay in Beijing. And he also knew that those 'right-wing speech' were all things that had been known for some days. So they stayed in the factory all the time. Factory is the most practical place, whoever has technology, who can do it, who has the actual 'weight'. Nie guangchi Chongzhi, with his wisdom and perseverance, quickly became a technical innovator and won the love of a girl. The whole family of three generations red, root red and miao zheng, her family does not agree to this marriage anyway, and the girl does not marry Nie guangchi Chongzhi, preferring to sever contacts with her family. The girl finally became his lady. It is said that wearing a 'right' hat can still 'pick the hat', but there is a premise that mistakes must be admitted seriously. Of course, people on the right are striving to 'pick up the hat' and get spiritual liberation at an early date. However, Nie guangchi Chongzhi's work is silent and buried hard, and 'politically' is not actively 'demanding progress'. The factory leader kindly advised him: quickly acknowledged the wrong, picked up the hat, even if it passed, can be a bright man in the future, but Nie guangchi Chongzhi like head cattle, something else is good to say, that I'm wrong, no door! Therefore, his 'hat' was not corrected until after the Cultural Revolution, when the country reviewed the anti-right issue in a unified manner, and the university diploma was also obtained after the 'Cultural Revolution'. Now become a well-known switch technology expert. 
Nie guangchi Chongzhi still met a good leader, and Nie guangchi Guangdi was in trouble. He works in a research department in Beijing and is classified as the right. His main right-wing speech is said to be a 'If a lover will finally be a family member', an article calling for a couple separated from the two places, but in fact has to do with family origin and studying at Yanjing University and Harvard University in the United States. He was more thought to be 'bad attitude' and then imprisoned, and finally died in prison. 
Nie guangchi Guangda is a animal husbandry expert of the Academy of Agricultural Sciences. In order to cultivate excellent breeds of cows and pigs, he has traveled in Chongming and rural Shanghai counties for many years. The results obtained have been recognized by the General Administration of Agriculture Reclamation of the Ministry of Agriculture. He also held a national farm site meeting to introduce his experience. However, in the Cultural Revolution, I don't know how so many 'problems' will come up at once, and they have been quarantined for two years, and families are not allowed to visit. It was not released until a month after Lin Biao exploded himself. On that day, the Academy of Agricultural Sciences held a general meeting and declared that he 'had a reason for the incident and found no evidence, and therefore withdrew the quarantine review'. Because he lived a life of complete isolation from the world, he did not know anything about Lin Biao. So according to the usual practice at that time, he shouted: 'Long live Chairman Mao! Vice Chairman Lin in good health!' Cause a burst of laughter under the stage...
People who had been quarantined for nearly two years were elected as deputies to the Eighth Municipal People's Congress in 1983, let alone when the 1988 NPC changed, he was also recommended by the Organizational Department of the Municipal Committee for election as a member of the Ninth Municipal People's Congress and Finance Committee. 
In the Cultural Revolution, there were several other people killed by the persecution of Nie guangchi's family. Jiufang's son-in-law Qu Duizhi, is Nie guangchi Qu Qipu's husband, famous writer, son of former Minister of Military Affairs Qu Hongqi, expert in classical literature research, life works of great abundance, mainly 'People and Customs Congregation', 'Introduction to Chinese Mania', 'Fang Zhi Examination', 'Wang Hui Zu', 'Li Baizu School' Notes, 'Liu Yuxi Collection Notes', 'Moratorium and Room essays', 'Lo Telling', etc. In the Cultural Revolution, one of his former students was bitten indiscriminately during quarantine censorship, revealing that he had attacks on Jiang Qing, which resulted in an ongoing counter-revolution, in 1973. 
The youth of a chong descendant, because they were framed and criticized, they really couldn't eat, and died suicide. 
The most tragic thing is that the daughter of four rooms, Nie guangchi Guangxi, on the train from Jinan to Shanghai, was actually killed alive by the 'South Lower Corps' of the Red Guards in Beijing with a copper head belt...
Three old trees in the cold wind
In the summer of 1994, a poster of Chinese painting appeared on the streets of Brussels, the Belgian capital. Dark clouds on the poster, cold wind whistling, a dark earth, standing three dead branches old trees, supporting each other, under the Chinese Nie guangchi's brothers joint art exhibition. When people walked into the showroom, the three brothers were not old men, but three living tiger middle-aged people. However, their personal character has been hammered like an old tree. They are Nie guangchi Chongyong, Nie guangchi Chongping, Nie guangchi Chongliang. 
Nie guangchi Chongyong is the boss, who was a worker in the factory, because all the samples performed well, and the amateur also did cultural propaganda for the factory, and the organizational department was ready to develop him into the party. But when people turned over his file and found that he was Nie guangchi's family, he had serious problems with his origin, and said to him, 'You didn't play, draw your paintings!' He really likes painting from childhood, especially pets, puppies, kittens and birds, to a spiritual one under his pen. A few decades later, he won a gold medal at a European painting exhibition, drawing a cat, but he took most of his life to the cat. 
Woe from the Cultural Revolution. At a factory-wide conference, he was suddenly pulled into the first detention centre at the station road, and more than a dozen people squeezed a cell No. 15, which had two more unbridled 'live treasures', one was Wang Rowang and one was Yu Duff's nephew with the excitement. We began to be very heroic, the sea and sky chat, take turns to tell stories, jokes. Wang Ruowang asserted that 'Xiao Nie guangchi certainly will not be released long.' Well, one day he was called out and said he went back to the factory to see the material. But when he really faced his 'material', people suddenly frightened, and he was sentenced to seven years for the current counter-revolution. When he returned to the First Detention Centre, he was no longer eligible to return to cell 15 and was kept alone in room 16. He wanted to tell his own situation to his partner next door, but between the two chambers there was only an intentional small hole in the toilet. And he was lying in the hole and called upon the people of that head. When room 15 people heard of his news, they immediately died and could not laugh again. At that time, his son was only five months, and his young wife was holding his child every day to find a work team, and Central asked to see her husband... He later spent 10 years at the basket bridge, because he performed well as the prisoner's large group leader. He said to the author: 'I have never been an official in my life, but I was an 'officer' at the basket bridge.' 
Nie guangchi Chongliang, in his 50s, has two career as 'counter-revolutionary'. For the first time in the era of the Great Leap Forging, he was 16 years old, and he was a forger in a factory with the support army south of Fujian. Who knows that in an accidental incident, he became a counter-revolution overnight, and was transferred to the deep mountains of northern Fujian for logging kilns. In the days of loss of freedom, the painting became the only spiritual comfort. He was disobedient and unable to endure inhumane discrimination and torment. On a dark night, he secretly climbed the train on the north and returned to Shanghai, and lived in hiding in Tibet in the east. Many years later, they were rehabilitative. 
In 1963, he was 21 years old, and he could not be fed forever, so he left Shanghai again and went to more distant Xinjiang, to become a soldier of the Xinjiang construction corps, put sheep, dig canal, firewood, farm, work is not terrible, and at the end of the desert, there is a pristine landscape unimaginable by inland people, Tang Poetry The magnificent scene of the 'desert solitary smoke straight, long river sunset yen' So, that's a great opportunity to sketch and create. Who knows the good view is not long, the Cultural Revolution began, he became a counter-revolutionary for the second time, together with more than 30 other people in cachots... 8 years in prison, with endless suffering. Later, he was sent to re-employment. When he repeats the most primitive labor of mankind, God opened the window of art for him. 
In summer, he squat in the wheat field, a long wind blowing, heavy wheat wave ups and downs, raised a rustle, like a flaming color tumbling in the wind... Playing adobe is a heavy and monotonous job, when he mechanically repeats the way of survival of the ancestors, the mind is trembled again, several Years later, his 'Cowman' won Silver Award at the European International Exhibition of Modern Art ; 'Billet Man' and 'Spring', won the Golden Rooster Award and Bronze Award at the European Ottgen Cultural Center International Art Exhibition. 
Nie guangchi Chongping is also a 'counter-revolution', and the Cultural Revolution supervises labor in units for 10 years. His appearance is quite 'Hunan flavor', known as 'horse face'. In fact, he is not only appearance, character is also quite Xiangjun style, bold, adventurous, love hunting, as if he was not afraid of things. During the 3-year 'natural disaster' period, he always likes to go to the country on the cold winter night to hit birds, take up a gun, drive dozens of miles, sometimes with a partner, brother, most of him go out alone. The bamboo forest is frozen into a group of sparrows, knocked off one, and the rest do not know to fly away, more to shrink together, come down overnight, dozens less, more hundreds. Every time he triumphed, he always had the feeling of a European medieval knight. 
Birds are connoisseurs, while working is not. In 1989, he enrolled in the Royal Academy of Fine Arts of Belgium, relying on part-time work to sustain life and education. He paints and punches the birds very much, and the kitchen is slow. The European restaurant's decoration, color, people's clothing, jewelry styles, all left the heart, so that the boss did not like him, often done in the morning only half a day, in the afternoon was fired 'squid'. He said he was not lazy, but he was not good. 
One day he moved his work to the streets, actually came to buy a lot of people, can make good prices. He won't be happy, no longer need to go to a restaurant to work, can draw and draw. He completed his studies in Belgium and came to New York to work, capture, and rumble in the world of free artists. 
His paintings are also in the west, the Oriental art language into the modern atmosphere of the West, the ancient Chinese traditional concept, art and dialogue with the Western world, so he has the 'Sunset Heart', the spirit of personality of the deserted era. 
Later, his paintings continue to win and sell better and better. He also launched the paintings of two brothers far away from Shanghai and held a joint painting exhibition of Nie guangchi's Brothers. When designing the poster, he tried hard to think: our three brothers, ah, now finally looked up, like what? Oh, with! That is the three old trees in the cold wind, all in the vicissitudes! 【Attached】People's Daily: 'Attempting to incite followers to attack the party against Nie guoping Gao Qichen is an imperialist minion' (1957.8.24)
[Xinhua News Agency, Tianjin, 23] Catholics in Tianjin have recently revealed the crimes of attacking the communist party's religious policy and provoking relations between Catholics and the people's government. 
Nie guoping is a deputy chairman of the Association for the Promotion of Catholic Patriotic Movement in Tianjin. It was revealed that he used the opportunity to help the party to rectify the wind, openly defended criminals carrying out counter-revolutionary activities in religious cloak, and also slandered 'land reform', 'three contrasts' and 'rebellion' political movements 'mistaken'. After he inspected the anti-revolt work as a representative of the people of Tianjin city, he actually wanted to turn the case on behalf of the counter-revolutionaries, saying: 'The case of Catholics is not a political issue, it is a matter of materialism and mentalism', and outright that 'those sentenced to ten years and 20 years in prison should be acquitted today.' Not only did he direct his little silly at Tianjin Normal College and posted many of the large print of the Communist Party, but also publicly at the Catholic and Christian Youth Association, inciting young people to grievance with the party. Before he went to Beijing to attend a meeting of Chinese Catholic representatives, he searched around Tianjin for opposition to the Communist Party, and tried to defend the anti-revolutionary organization 'Notre Dame Army' and propose the release of the counter-revolutionary Gong Pinmei. 
Gao Qingchen is a standing member of the Association for the Promotion of Catholic Patriotic Movement in Tianjin. He and Nie guoping used an influential journal within the Catholic Church to incite people to attack the Communist Party. He has openly suggested that 'private ownership is better than public ownership, and the church should advocate private ownership'. In order to confuse the believers, Gao Qingchen's reactionary remarks spread on the 'widely publicized' were painted with religious colors. In his reactionary poem 'I want kindness, not sacrifice', he abused the Communist Party in a vague tone and said, 'If you just declare that you love me that you don't see, but don't care at all about tens of thousands of people My portraits; instead constantly sucking blood from them to me, you think, how can I please your offering-On your when?' Gao Qingchen's reactionary activities became more rampant after right-wing elements rampant to attack the party. He sent dozens of letters to 'widely publicized' correspondents asking them to reflect 'dissatisfaction with the party.' When he heard some of the youths expressed some dissatisfaction with the party at the Tianjin Youth Congress, he went all day long to visit young people to gather remarks about the party's dissatisfaction with the party written 'The controversy of Tianjin's youth friends' was published in 'Guangzhang'. He was enchanted about the fallacy of 'the party world' of Chu Anping; when he saw Ge Pei Qi's clamor of 'killing the Communist Party,' he said, 'Very pertinent, not to avoid the complications of his When Chen Jianchen, a representative of the CPPCC, wrote an article in the newspaper 'indignation and questioning Chuanping', Gao immediately wrote a essay, 'Why should I be outraged' to justify the issue. 
It is revealed that the two right-wing elements, Nie guoping and Gao Qingchen, are all the minions of imperialism that have always been anti-Communist and anti-people. Nie guoping was born from buying a bourgeois family. During the anti-Japanese war, Zeng Bai had traitors doing a speculative business. After his surrender, Japanese Kou joined the reactionist Du Fuxiang's door, and organized a miscellaneous army to serve as 'Lieutenant Colonel Secretary', and later relinquished the Catholic reactionary head Yu Bin to preside over the 'Catholic Cultural Association' in Tianjin. Hundreds of members have been developed to become accomplices to the counter-revolutionary activities of imperialists within the Catholic Church. Gao Qingchen Landlord was born from his family and served as head of the Organization Department of the Pseudo-New People's Association during the anti-Japanese war. After the surrender of Nikko, a reporter of the reactionary newspaper 'Yissei newspaper', and was also the manager of the 'forward forward' news agency run by Liao Yao-xiang, chief of the KMT's new six army army officers. He had collaborated with KMT agents to trap the Communist Party underground staff He was arrested by the People's Government after liberation and sentenced to two years in prison, and was very hostile to the Communist Party.

The loading and unloading truck turned out to be a migrant worker or a handling unit, and the villains in the movement imposed on us as a means of punishment. Arrive in the middle of the night, get up and unloading. Overload of labor, really unbearable, really want to die, but another thought: what are we wrong? Be sure to bite your teeth and insist, wait until the day of the rebellion, and never let these people's conspiracy succeed. 
Ivenpiao is a Shang County of East Timor, a military soldier of the army, a member of the Communist Party, and honesty. Why pulled him out as a traitor? It is puzzling. He was born from a poor farmer and joined the PLA in his teenage age. He was unable to march with the troops because of illness, and led him to foster him in the homes of the ordinary people to get sick. This old town is very poor, and he can't afford to buy it, then let him go to the village to become a soldier of the Kuomintang force. Soon this force fought with the PLA, and Ivanpiu was liberated and became known as the PLA, and later went to North Korea to fight, he fought heroically, and soon became part of the party, and he suffered injuries in the battle, and one leg was disabled, which only turned to the place. Throw him out as a traitor and criticize him, and he thought hard to accept. 
The comrade was strong, one day after fighting back to our bullshed, I saw his eyes straight into the beams. My intuition tells me that his heart is very painful but inconvenient to talk. The next evening, the train station informed that there were two cars reed foil on the station east platform, and asked us to take care of it. In the past, it was a migrant worker in custody. This can save money and punish us, and this task naturally falls on us. The night look could not sleep, but it was an opportunity to enlighten him. I opened the door to the mountain and said, 'Ivenpiu you are not in the mood for these days. It is about your heart, you can't hide from me, to be honest.' 
He fell off without opening tears: 'I really don't want to live, really want to get a rope tied on the beam to end myself.' I solemnly said to him, 'You want to be wrong, you do it, just what those people want, you would not have been a traitor. If you really died, would you not become a traitor of the party and the people? Your wife, Bao'e, became a widow, and your son had lost his father, was not that a house broken dead?' He oops and said: 'Not a place for you, almost done one of the most stupid things, I know!' Then he loved and his son came to see him, and he said to his son, 'I can survive, thanks to your old Nieuber enlightened, he is my savior!' 
Can you want to get it? Even though I was locked in that year, I became a salvation man.
